font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "85", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2489954040593791953/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "6859294124745442997", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2013-02-02T06:09:00+05:30", "updated": "2013-02-02T16:59:36+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzU5ODA0NTc2MTM2Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/stowage-of-multiple-parcels-on-chemical.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6859294124745442997", "title": "STOWAGE OF MULTIPLE PARCELS ON CHEMICAL TANKERS - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ACSp2oM5irs/UQxcoZHd2-I/AAAAAAAAdKA/KqW9788FaMk/s1600/hhhj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ACSp2oM5irs/UQxcoZHd2-I/AAAAAAAAdKA/KqW9788FaMk/s1600/hhhj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE VADAKAYIL LOADING CURRY&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red;\">- &nbsp;PARCEL CHEMICAL TANKER STOWAGE PLANNING </span></b>- </span>CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><i>( This post is on special request from one of my readers &nbsp;Haris &nbsp;from Pakistan.)</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">THUMB RULE: A Master must never get rushed by his IGNORANT commercial operator, into giving a fast stow by telephone . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">Some of the charterers are stupid and they can see only from their point of view, and they have NO dang idea what goes on in a Captain's mind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">If a Captain gets arm twisted by such a stupid guy , &nbsp;he is shortchanging himself, his ship , his owners, his technical managers, his Chief Officer and his crew..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">He is bound to create a lot of heart ache for himself. And his crew is gonna work their butts of for no reason. Worse you can fail the Wall wash test or the first foot sample.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">A good stow is like a work of art. &nbsp;Everything is considered-- as you can see that I have put 65 items here for consideration.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\">A good stow is like making a good Sambhar curry - which I call the </span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><b>VADAKAYIL LOADING CURRY.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XTVNsM315LU/UQxfrlSpHjI/AAAAAAAAdMA/wMbntAVC_3g/s1600/ghj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XTVNsM315LU/UQxfrlSpHjI/AAAAAAAAdMA/wMbntAVC_3g/s1600/ghj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">Lot of vegetables got to go in -- not at the same time-- &nbsp;but at different times or they get over cooked or under cooked.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">The real \"Vadakayil loading curry\" &nbsp;has 130 items-- double . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">This post has just 65, and this is good enough-.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\">No chemical planners brains on this planet earth will go beyond 50-- and let me leave something aside, only for my chelas..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LR7--0dmMFQ/UQxuvuVvqTI/AAAAAAAAdNw/RIfCemSkbZQ/s1600/imagesfhjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"137\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LR7--0dmMFQ/UQxuvuVvqTI/AAAAAAAAdNw/RIfCemSkbZQ/s400/imagesfhjk.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When working out a stow\nfor parcel chemical cargoes , the checks to be carried out, &nbsp;include\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.\nCheck the ship\u2019s Certificate of Fitness if the cargo can be carried. If the\ncargo is not in the list , inform the Chemical operator who will take remedial\naction. Permission can be obtained from the flag administration for the new\nchemical based on a tripartite agreement between shipping country , receiving\ncountry and flag state of the carrier, and attached to the COF as an addendum.\nSince new chemicals are being invented and re-evaluated for carriage almost\nevery day it is possible that many cargoes may not be in the COF.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.Even if the cargo can\nbe carried as per the COF, the tank lining resistance tables must still be\nconsulted, or the cargo cannot be carried. The notes about the previous cargo\ncarried in the tanks, forms part of this important check.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3.Check the\nCompatibility Chart A . It is a must to check the exceptions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4.If the cargo is\nedible, check the FOSFA lists. Both banned and acceptable lists must be\nchecked. It is not enough to check just one of them. But if the terms of cargo\ncarriage require consultation of NIOP or EU lists , instead of FOSFA, do so. It\ngoes without mentioning that the Master must aim that ships tanks are always\nFOSFA ready for better future employment prospects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5.Check the load\ndensity of the tanks. It is possible for heavy cargoes like sulphuric acid, the\nload density may not permit a full load of 98%.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6.Toxic cargoes must\nnever be loaded next to edible cargoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7.Water reactive\nchemical cargoes like Sulphuric acid must not be loaded next to SBT ballast\ntanks which require ballast for trim or list correction for proper execution of\nvoyage at sea and at berth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8.Do not heat one tank\nof chemical to within 10 degrees of the BP on the chemical in the other\nadjacent tank. Set the tank high temperature alarm in CCR accordingly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9.Check the P&amp;A\nmanual for sloshing considerations. Loading say between 20% to 80% may be\nbanned depending on the length of the cargo tank or its length with respect to\nthe LOA of ship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10.Check the intact stability, trim and list-- the amount of SBT ballast required, without cooling heated cargo tanks .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11.To prevent tanks\nfrom getting cubed out, it is important to know the SG at load temperature.\nMany chemicals are loaded in a hot condition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12.As certain Category\nY&nbsp; chemicals may have to be prewashed if\nthere is excess of clingage on tank bulkheads after completion of discharge, it\nis important to plan ballasting which may introduce a cold interface. Check if\nyour loadicator has Harbour condition for SF/ BM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13.Certain cargoes have\nto be recirculated at sea for successful discharge . It may not be a requirement\nof the shippers or charterers. A cemented deepwell pump impeller can cause\ndelays in start of discharge or severe pump damage. Ensure that such cargoes\nare loaded in tanks whose drops can be fitted with diffuser nozzles. Certain\ncargoes like molasses can have excessive debris , in which case there must be a\nprefilter before the ships manifold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">14.Know the Deepwell\npumps whose cofferdam leaks. Purging records must be consulted to check if it\nexceeds permissible limits. Do not stow polymerising cargoes in such tanks.\nSufficient cargo seals must be held on board. Chief engineer must be absolutely\nfamiliar in replacing leaky seals and with tool kits used .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">15.When high MP cargoes\nare loaded in winter, ensure that the cargo does not get frozen in\npipelines.&nbsp; The pipeline line\nconfiguration must be considered for instant draining by gravity or steam/ air/\nnitrogen blow. Personal attention must be paid to this scenario by both master\nand chief officer. Frozen pipeline and cargo delays mean that the ship\u2019s\nmanagement has not studied the pipeline 3D configuration and planned in\nadvance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">16.To avoid prewash of\nCat Y cargoes the AH, VH and DH values must be monitored. Sometimes shippers\nput a limit on VH and DH purely due to quality concerns in which case it may\nnot be possible to heat more that 10 degrees of BP during dischg.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">17.If tanks without\nsteam inlet pipe thermal lagging on deck have to be heated excessively in\nwinter seas with continuous cold spray from forecastle, it makes energy\nconservation sense to ensure that only short lengths of aft tanks are involved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">18.Tanks with deepwell\npump suctions protruding into ballast tank at the bottom can have a frozen pump\nimpeller. Such a cold frozen pocket can remain so even if the entire cargo tank\nof high MP cargo is well heated . The level of cold ballast underneath such a\npocket must be monitored by chief officer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">19.Cargo stow history\nof last 3 cargoes must also include the ullage levels, especially if the\ncargoes have been non-water soluble , high BP, high MP , strong odour\ninsensitive ones. Cancelling out effects of a subsequent cargo depends on\nullages.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">20.Avoid loading sensitive\nwallwash cargoes in non-water soluble , high BP previous cargo tanks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">21.Very high viscous\ncargoes like high brix molasses or clay slurries must be loaded in tanks with\nbig pumps and big dia dischg risers. It is immaterial if the discharge port claims\nto have a booster pump on quay to assist discharge. This is more important if\nship does not have her own screw booster pump at the manifold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">22.There are certain\ncargoes like MEG FG where the preload inspection by surveyor does not allow\nwater condensation on bulkheads. If the adjacent tank contains a cold interface\ncargo like Styrene Monomer, it becomes a impossible task. Avoid such a scenario\nby giving an alternate stow. Warm moist air will always condense on a cold\nsurface , as a thumb rule.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">23.Avoid loading odour\nsensitive cargoes ( edibles, glycerines, spirit, MEG FG after strong odour\ncargoes ( MTBE, Phenol, Acrylate, Fish oil, Molasses ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">24.Heat expansion due\nto AH or ambient voyage temperatures. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">25.High VP cargo PV\nvents must never get rimed. Riming due to cold sea spray from forecastle is\nusual in Bering sea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">26.Bad steam coils can\ncause water contamination or worse boiler explosion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">27.Toxic heated tanks\nlike Phenol must be sufficiently away from the accommodation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">28.If ballast pumps\nderive the power from the Main Framo Power pack, this means all ballasting,\ndeballasting operations for trimming/ listing at berth will affect the cargo\ndischarge rate.&nbsp; Plan cargo in such a way\nthat dischg time is not lost at berth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">29.Cargoes like\nSulphuric acid ( exothermic reaction while tankcleaning with water which\ndamages tank lining ) and Annex 1 lubes ( expensive oil in slop quantity ) must\nbe properly superstripped at completion of discharge. Check superstripping\nhardware facilities before you plan the stow. Some ships have aft tank delivery\ndecklines with a natural tilt towards the manifold, to avoid smaller superstrip\nlines .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">30.Use minimum number\nof tanks which have to be squeegeed, recirculated or flushing framo pump\ncofferdams while running .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">31.Where Nitrogen has\nto be padded at sea ( especially from Nitrogen bottle bank , when ship does not\nhave a fixed plant ) , keep the cargo tanks full , to reduce the effort and\nmoney.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">32.For drying and\nSemi-drying veg oils ensure there is no AH. This will reduce the tankcleaning\ntime and consumption of tankcleaning chemicals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">33.Allow for tank\nlining recovery time. For example , stainless steel after carriage of Wet or\nGreen Fertiliser grade Phosphoric acid.&nbsp;\nEpoxy tank&nbsp; after carriage of\nBenzene.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">34.In case of WWT , a\nspare set of tanks must be ready. In case of WWT failure, certain ports like\nJubail or Terminals like DOW do not permit extra cleaning at berth , and ship\nhas to cast off and anchor in designated area.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">35.When certain cargoes\nlike Sulphuric acid has to be surrounded by empty tanks , keep such tanks of\nlow volume to avoid losing cargo space.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">36.When you get long\nocean crossings with partly empty ship, allow for a chance to do passivation\nand epoxy lining touch with sufficient curing time up by shipstaff.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">37.After one aggressive\ncargo like Caustic Soda, do not plan another aggressive cargo like Wet\nPhosphoric acid before the SS tanklining can recover.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">38.To desorb a solvent\ncargo like Benzene from swollen epoxy lining, it may be necessary to apply adjacent\nheat to speed up evaporation. Absorbed chemical in epoxy can cause huge\ncontamination claims and failure of coating while impinging with watercleaning\njets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">39.Offset bad effects\nof previous cargo with new cargo. Keep tanks always FOSFA ready and WWT ready.\nExample \u2013loading gasoline or Phosphoric acid after Palm oil fatty acids.\nTankcleaning time and tankcleaning chemicals can be saved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">40.If you are using\nsame manifold flexible hose for discharging many grades , gives the best grades\nfirst.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">41.With drying veg oils\nor polymerising cargoes in tank , it may not be possible to use steam for\ncleaning or reducing chlorides in the adjacent tanks. Polymerisation can take\nplace even at cruciform weld corners.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">42.Have a record of\nshipboard PV valve pressure / vacuum tests, done with on board test kits. Use\nthe best PV valves&nbsp; for high VP volatile\ncargoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">43.While discharging\nAnnex 1 CPP at submarine terminals, it must be noted that no airblow will be\nallowed as per terminal rules to prevent damage to submerged hose. Ensure that\ninternal stripping can be carried out with proper line configuration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">44.Know your tankcleaning\nchemical ROB and the possibility of replenishment. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">45.Avoid methanol\nmanual spray to get a tank ready for WWT cargo. Check out the last 3 cargoes\nwell and plan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">46.If ship has loaded\ncolour dyed cargoes in zinc tanks, avoid using the same tanks for WWT cargoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">47.Chloride sensitive\ncargoes like MEG FG keep away from sea waves. A check can be made on routing\ncharts for wind direction . Low freeboard chemical tankers must be aware that a\nbutter worth port seal is effective only if there are 2 packing ring seals (\ninner teflon/ outer viton) , with check nuts. SS nuts and bolts do not have\nfriction coefficient and can slip when buffeted by waves or with normal\nvibration. Greasing SS threads and lowering the friction further can cause\nhorrendous cargo claims. With exhothermic/ sputtering cargoes like sulphuric\nacid, the whole adventure might come under imminent peril.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">48.When dischg high MP\ncargoes in winter, it should be possible to transfer the contents of a tank (\nwith frozen pipelines ) to another nearby tank having same cargo with portable\nframo pump.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">49.Cargoes which\nrequire oxygen dependent additives , load in large tanks &gt;3000 cum.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">50.Edible high spec\ncargo for Coke like White Phosphoric acid has to be recirculated in empty tanks\nas a flush and then this flushed quantity is down graded to fertiliser grade\nand stowed in another tank. Ensure there is sufficient trim / list to do this\neffectively and fast , as in winter this flushed quantity of high MP will\nfreeze.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">51.Avoid loading phenol\nin tanks which carried acid as previous cargo, unless the tank is washed well\nand pH value is reduced in tank and appendages to minimum 6/7.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">52.For special cargoes\nlike HMD or chlorinated solvents check the list of acceptable previous cargoes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">53.If FFA and moisture\ncontent is unknown for hydrolysable cargoes avoid giving a epoxy tank stow. SS\ntank is best.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">54.Cleaning temperature\nor DH must not exceed the max allowed for the tank lining .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">55.In ships with centre\ntanks load high MP water insoluble cargoes in centre tanks to avoid shifting\nSBT around to prevent cold interface.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">56.In case you are\nloading / dischg high MP cargoes in winter from barges , with frequent\nstoppages&nbsp; it is of great advantage to\nhave a natural slope of pipeline from manifold to ships tank, assisting airblow\nflow by gravity,&nbsp; to prevent cargo\nfreezing inside pipelines and causing delay. Phenol can kill the crew who may\nbe trying to clear a frozen pipeline in a unplanned hurry. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">57.When squeegeing high\nMP cargoes in winter, it is better to have a gravity slope from tank to\nmanifold, to prevent cargo freezing in pipelines in about 20 minutes of manual\nsqueegeing time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">58.Tanks whose deepwell\npump seals require change must be planned to the emptied out first in a series\nof dischg ports.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">59.Ship can fail NVM\ntest of WWT, if the tank has contained high BP previous cargo or if the SS tank\nis unpassivated with poor chromic oxide layer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">60.Tanks which have to\nbe recirculated at sea must have a delivery check valve which will prevent the\ntank cargo from travelling to manifold .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">61.Make sure charterers\nagree with your stow. While you are keeping 60 points in mind, which can\nbenefit your ship and crew, the charterers or shippers will have only their own\nnarrow interests in focus, where they make more money from the voyage.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">61.It must be\nremembered that common CRUCIFORM welds is NOT permitted between Bunker tanks\nand toxic chemical tank\u2014but it IS allowed between water reactive chemical tank\nand&nbsp; Ballast tanks. For HEAT segregation\nto prevent polymerization/ decomposition/ evolution of dangerous gas\u2014cruciform\nweld touching is NOT allowed. Touching CRUCIFORM welds NOT involving heat\nsegregation between incompatible chemicals are allowed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AbZKMm6Vn90/UQz2XvGQ-3I/AAAAAAAAdPw/yqx3-kyr12g/s1600/downloadbn,.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AbZKMm6Vn90/UQz2XvGQ-3I/AAAAAAAAdPw/yqx3-kyr12g/s320/downloadbn,.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">62. The stowage must be\nin consonance with the Damage stability requirements ( breach of empty and full compartments creating list ) --more so when all tanks\nare cubically full with high density cargo, and loading to tropical loadlines.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qeWP6TFcKE0/UQz2SZVxq9I/AAAAAAAAdPo/GMK-GLQqJtQ/s1600/vhjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"136\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qeWP6TFcKE0/UQz2SZVxq9I/AAAAAAAAdPo/GMK-GLQqJtQ/s200/vhjk.jpg\" width=\"200\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">63. Do NOT allow condensation due to a cold interface bulkhead to fail the tank inspection--- and when cargo is NOT ready , the shippers get very squeamish about some water condensation on the bulkhead , even if the chemical is NOT water sensitive.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">64. In case of multiple ports with load/ discharge , be aware that a cold bulkhead due to cargo interface cannot be HOT cleaned properly or even steamed properly.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">65.Make sure charterers agree with your stow. While you are keeping 65 points in mind, which can benefit your ship and crew, the charterers or shippers will have only their own narrow interests in focus, where they make more money from the voyage.</span><span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">You fail the Wall wash test or the&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">first foot --and your baby is burnt..</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8Qe_vRxwkDk/UQxu3RYaVQI/AAAAAAAAdN4/oCvjbdPB8OY/s1600/xxdsdw.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8Qe_vRxwkDk/UQxu3RYaVQI/AAAAAAAAdN4/oCvjbdPB8OY/s320/xxdsdw.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CARGO PLANNING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vessel shall be\nloaded/discharged in accordance with the conditions provided in the approved\nStability and Trim Manual &amp; P&amp;A manual with respect to load line, trim\nand, intact stability and strength.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The loading computer\nshall be calibrated against the test condition (class approved, where\napplicable) before each cargo planning operation and at least quarterly in\norder to verify the reliability of the information.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Records of such calibration\nshall be maintained by the Chief Officer. If the vessel is not provided with a\nloading computer, checks shall be undertaken to verify actual draft conditions\nagainst conditions provided in the vessel\u2019s trim and stability booklet &amp;\nP&amp;A manual (loading manual).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prior to arrival\nloading/discharging port, the Chief Officer shall pre-calculate the cargo and\nprepare a Cargo plan. The Cargo Plan shall comply with ISGOTT and ICS Tanker\nSafety Guide \u2013 Chemical.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It shall include details of cargo loading/discharging\noperations and rates, and ballasting, taking into consideration the maximum\nallowed free surface moment, possible draft and air draft limitations, trim and\nstress, ullages/soundings, cargo stowage, and management of tank\natmosphere.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Cargo Plan shall be\navailable at the ship-shore interface meeting.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sfnXNV4Q6DA/UQxfVIJEslI/AAAAAAAAdL4/rJg_0lUsxT4/s1600/capt+ajit+vadakayil+3.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sfnXNV4Q6DA/UQxfVIJEslI/AAAAAAAAdL4/rJg_0lUsxT4/s320/capt+ajit+vadakayil+3.JPG\" width=\"303\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<b>CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">30 YEARS IN COMMAND</span></div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "41", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/6859294124745442997/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "4715247550214836887", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2013-02-01T21:14:00+05:30", "updated": "2013-02-02T19:30:43+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzU5ODEzNjQzNTQ2Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/02/growing-old-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/4715247550214836887", "title": "GROWING OLD - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JEy7tHWdKh8/UQvigG3X5SI/AAAAAAAAdAY/A2qNMCfuoec/s1600/imagesDFGG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JEy7tHWdKh8/UQvigG3X5SI/AAAAAAAAdAY/A2qNMCfuoec/s1600/imagesDFGG.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<h3>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></h3>\n<h3>\n<span style=\"font-family: Times, Times New Roman, serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">GROWING OLD</span> - &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span></h3>\n<div style=\"font-family: 'Comic Sans ms', 'Lucida Casual', Textile, Arial, sans-serif;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z1cyH9hia74/UQvilVY_GGI/AAAAAAAAdAg/ZWQTRnIjC2M/s1600/imagesEEEEE.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z1cyH9hia74/UQvilVY_GGI/AAAAAAAAdAg/ZWQTRnIjC2M/s1600/imagesEEEEE.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2KTQ3Jv2XXc/UQwDiEzlEGI/AAAAAAAAdIQ/yp8vLfCXN2o/s1600/imagesCCCC.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2KTQ3Jv2XXc/UQwDiEzlEGI/AAAAAAAAdIQ/yp8vLfCXN2o/s1600/imagesCCCC.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><u><b>I'm Fine, How are You?</b></u></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">There's nothing the matter with me,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">I'm just as healthy as can be,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">I have arthritis in both knees,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And when I talk, I talk with a wheeze.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">My pulse is weak, my blood is thin,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">But I'm awfully well for the shape I'm\nin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">All my teeth have had to come out,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">And my diet I hate to think about.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">I'm overweight and I can't get thin,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">But I'm awfully well for the shape I'm\nin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Arch supports I need for my feet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Or I wouldn't be able to go out in the\nstreet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Sleep is denied me night after night,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">But every morning I find I'm all right.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">My memory's failing, my head's in a\nspin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">But I'm awfully well for the shape I'm\nin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">The moral of this as the tale unfolds,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Is that for you and me, who are growing\nold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">It is better to say \"I'm fine\"\nwith a grin,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Than to let people know the shape we are\nin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">I'm fine, how are you ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-neAyTcsRtIs/UQviov_kNKI/AAAAAAAAdAo/1tVt97yrZ9I/s1600/AAA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"200\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-neAyTcsRtIs/UQviov_kNKI/AAAAAAAAdAo/1tVt97yrZ9I/s200/AAA.jpg\" width=\"196\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lU4bd9h0tU4/UQvivgjDP2I/AAAAAAAAdAw/AtIaI792vzI/s1600/imagesDDDDD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-lU4bd9h0tU4/UQvivgjDP2I/AAAAAAAAdAw/AtIaI792vzI/s320/imagesDDDDD.jpg\" width=\"318\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><u><b>ABC's of Aging</b></u></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">A is for arthritis,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">B is for bad back,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">C is for the chest pains. Corned Beef?\nCardiac?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">D is for dental decay and decline,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">E is for eyesight--can't read that top\nline.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">F is for fissures and fluid retention<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">G is for gas (which I'd rather not\nmention--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">and not to forget other gastrointestinal\nglitches)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">H is high blood pressure<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">I is for itches, and lots of incisions<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">J is for joints, that now fail to flex<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">L is for libido--what happened to sex?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Wait! I forgot about K!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">K is for my knees that crack all the\ntime<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">(But forgive me, I get a few lapses in\nmy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Memory from time to time)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">N is for nerve (pinched) and neck\n(stiff) and neurosis<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">O is for osteo-for all the bones that\ncrack<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">P is for prescriptions, that cost a\nsmall fortune<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Q is for queasiness. Fatal or just the\nflu?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Give me another pill and I'll be good as\nnew!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">R is for reflux--one meal turns into two<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">S is for sleepless nights,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">counting fears on how to pay my medical\nbills!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">W is worry, for pains yet unfound<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Z is for zest<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">For surviving the symptoms my body's\ndeployed,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Indian AR Rehman and German Hans Zimmer joined forces on\nstage. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2009, the Rahman won\ntwo golden statuettes for best original score and best original song (Jai ho)\nfor the Hollywood movie Slumdog Millionaire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rahman is a music\ncomposer, singer, songwriter, music producer, musician&nbsp; and multi-instrumentalist . Zimmer is a music\ncomposer and producer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to two\nAcademy Awards, Rahman has won two Grammy Awards, a BAFTA Award, a Golden\nGlobe, four National Film Awards, fifteen Filmfare Awards and thirteen Filmfare\nAwards South in addition to numerous other awards and nominations.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is called \" the Mozart of\nMadras\"--&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be frank he is a greater genius than Mozart or Hans Zimmer as\nhe can sing too, in addition to being astonishing on the keyboard.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2009, Time placed\nRahman in its list of World's Most Influential People. The UK based World Music\nmagazine Songlines named him one of 'Tomorrow's World Music Icons' in August\n2011.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XpR_uLDdY4M/UQqXtxXp31I/AAAAAAAAc84/KTaI1MzRCjQ/s1600/160px-Hans_Zimmer_2010.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">German Hans Florian\nZimmer has composed music for several hit Hollywood movies like for The Lion\nKing (1994), Crimson Tide (1995), Gladiator (2000), The Last Samurai (2003),\nThe Dark Knight (2008) and Inception (2010).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He has received four Grammy\nAwards, two Golden Globes, a Classical BRIT Award, and an Academy Award.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two days ago, it was a\nbit distressing to hear that the rebels burn the library of Mali containing ancient\n&nbsp;books of knowledge accumulated by Mansa\nMusa , the richest king of this planet ever. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7-QJUO7Hqx8/UQlu1wzDeFI/AAAAAAAAc20/Eo38987NrAw/s1600/Timbuktu-manuscripts-astronomy-mathematics.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I guess the rebels did this with a heavy heart\nto prevent the white man stealing their books and carting it away.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As it is in\nthe guise of digital translation the white man has been trying hard to get hold\nof these ancient priceless books \u2014 most of which are Arabic translations\nof&nbsp; Kerala school of Vedic Maths and\nScience.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>US attempts to build up\nMali's military as a bulwark against the extremists, by training army officers\nand providing equipment including brand-new Land Cruisers with huge long range\nguns and expensive communications equipment, ( like in Libya ) backfired\nspectacularly last year after a rebellion in the north provoked a coup that\nunseated the elected government in Bamako. &nbsp;On March 22, 2012&nbsp; just a month before a presidential election\nin the country, US trained Capt Amadou Haya Sanogo and soldiers loyal to him\nstormed the presidential palace in the capital Bamako and overthrew President\nAmadou Toumani Toure.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">In 1799, the owner of\nBritish East India Company , German Jew Rothschild stole the largest amount of\ngold on this planet from Tipu Sultan , and carted it away to Europe.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">This would be the base of the\nRothschild banking cartel fortune-- and their elevation to the status of Big\nBrother.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tipu Sultan stole his\ngold from the vaults of the ancient Kerala temples, the fruit of millenniums of\ntrade in spices and knowledge \u2013yes- knowledge. &nbsp;An insignificant temple of South Kerala was\nNOT destroyed by Tipu Sultan.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He tried , but all he got for his efforts was a\nbroken leg and loss of his sword, which is now with Indian Businessman Vijay\nMallya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
