Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "63", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7993277265829890370/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "2063866183582420727", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2013-01-30T01:46:00+05:30", "updated": "2013-01-31T20:59:37+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzU5NjQ2MTc3NDczCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/understanding-jet-lag-and-managing-it.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2063866183582420727", "title": "UNDERSTANDING JET LAG AND MANAGING IT - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fGflhk9KL8I/UQgv8qHBIiI/AAAAAAAAcl0/ZkET8TPLEGc/s1600/fhki.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fGflhk9KL8I/UQgv8qHBIiI/AAAAAAAAcl0/ZkET8TPLEGc/s320/fhki.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">JET LAG PREVENTION</span> , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">MELATONIN</span> , <span style=\"color: blue;\">CIRCADIAN RHYTHMS</span>, &nbsp;NITROGEN DECOMPRESSION , <span style=\"color: magenta;\">NOISE CANCELLING BOSE HEADPHONES</span></span> </b>&nbsp;- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pFqMIQOViDs/UQgne97bGHI/AAAAAAAAckc/lu6MRUCjRM0/s1600/FFTR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pFqMIQOViDs/UQgne97bGHI/AAAAAAAAckc/lu6MRUCjRM0/s400/FFTR.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My elder son came home\nfor vacation from USA last month. Despite travelling several zones eastwards, causing\nsignificant circadian rhythm disruption he appeared fresh as cucumber when he\nlanded at Calicut. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He showed me his\nsecret. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-teTdGUP_Afw/UQgni_pmADI/AAAAAAAAckk/Ri6mrW-Arqo/s1600/boseqc3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"193\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-teTdGUP_Afw/UQgni_pmADI/AAAAAAAAckk/Ri6mrW-Arqo/s320/boseqc3.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A swank pair of Bose\nnoise-canceling headphones which kills the monotonous back ground ground noise\nof the jet engines and the hissing air inside the aircraft, and of course the usual\nnoise clutter. The Bose Quiet Comfort headphones set will set you back by 300 US dollars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It electronically\ncancel out sound waves. &nbsp;They do this by\npicking up a sound, processing it, and then creating a new sound that\neffectively cancels the original sound by destructive interference.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ECnihnN1Imw/UQgnq6QQAWI/AAAAAAAAcks/hlXmFmJJSmM/s1600/downloadfghjjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ECnihnN1Imw/UQgnq6QQAWI/AAAAAAAAcks/hlXmFmJJSmM/s320/downloadfghjjk.jpg\" width=\"307\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nowadays most airline\npilots use it on long haul flights.&nbsp; Bose\npioneered the technology and have been continually perfecting it for 26 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Having flown around the\nworld for the past 4 decades to embark and disemark from a ship, half way\nacross the globe , I guess i am competent enough to write about jet lag.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You find lot of people\ngiving you bull advise on how to manage jet lag. How can they do it when they\ndo NOT understand the real reason?&nbsp; There\nare many reasons , but some affect you more.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The air we breathe in\nthe aircraft contains 78% nitrogen, unlike divers who breathe in pure oxygen . When you inhale air, your body consumes\nthe oxygen, replaces some of it with carbon dioxide and does nothing with the\nnitrogen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At normal atmospheric pressure, some nitrogen and oxygen is dissolved\nin the fluid portions of your blood and tissues. Most of the oxygen gets\nconsumed by your tissues, but the nitrogen remains dissolved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitrogen, which is\npresent in body fluids, comes out of solution and forms bubbles if the pressure\non the body drops sufficiently as it does during ascent into the higher\naltitudes.&nbsp; Overweight persons are more\nsusceptible to evolved gas decompression sickness as fatty tissue contains more\nnitrogen. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OM8PWai-wmM/UQikHilYM4I/AAAAAAAAcqE/3u3O_-f2L08/s1600/imagesyl;p6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OM8PWai-wmM/UQikHilYM4I/AAAAAAAAcqE/3u3O_-f2L08/s320/imagesyl;p6.jpg\" width=\"268\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low pressure in the\ncabin causes the nitrogen gas in our body to expand, and this is what causes\nyour ankles and joints to swell, due to ruptured capillaries and edema caused\ndue to the type of iodised salt they use in the aircraft food. ..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kT4QL2JXkJA/UQgpSnjTnuI/AAAAAAAAck0/hAS7xIrc-8s/s1600/downloadtte33.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-kT4QL2JXkJA/UQgpSnjTnuI/AAAAAAAAck0/hAS7xIrc-8s/s320/downloadtte33.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lack of blood\ncirculation from sitting for long periods without moving, compressing the veins\nat the underside of the thighs makes matters worse.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">To remedy this, wear\nslippers or large travel shoes and periodically walk around.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Released nitrogen\nbubbles on ascent, are responsible for increased blood-clotting and complications\nof mountain sickness like by nausea, headache, loss of appetite, dizziness and\nsleep disturbance.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Airlines are required\nby civil aviation authorities to carry oxygen supplies in the event of an\nemergency such as a decompression. The supplies are in the form of drop-down\nmasks and portable oxygen cylinders. There is sufficient oxygen to allow either\na 30-minute high flow or a 60-minute low flow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although on-board oxygen is\navailable for medical incidents, the airline should be notified at least 48\nhours before departure for any supplemental requirements, particularly for\ncontinuous oxygen throughout the flight. Most of the airlines charge a\nsupplement for providing these additional facilities, which in the case of US\ncarriers can be up to US $200. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babies cry a lot, and\nproduce a dry cough which is the result of dehydration. The remedy is to get\nthem to breathe oxygen through a moist hand towel.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The humidity level\nwithin the aircraft cabin is low, partly because the outside air at high\naltitude contains 67 percent less water than at sea level and partly due to the fact that the outside cold air, has to be\nheated.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Respiratory viruses survive\nbetter than bacteria in low humidity and passengers tend to suffer from upper\nrespiratory infections post-flight.</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On long flights the\naircraft has very little moisture in the air and the relative humidity drops to\nless than 10% . &nbsp;Dehydration is the\nresult with dry skin and itchy eyes . &nbsp;The\nrest of the body reacts to the lack of moisture by adjusting its biochemical\nlevels, which can throw your entire system haywire.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our bodies consist of over 65% water, so when\nwe lose that water, every organ is affected.&nbsp;\nOur brain is 83% water, blood-92%, &nbsp;kidneys - 82%, &nbsp;liver-69% and muscles-75% . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ssE0s7wFTec/UQgqiuu9e-I/AAAAAAAAck8/Q13MaOnS6_U/s1600/symptoms-of-dehydration-in-adults.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ssE0s7wFTec/UQgqiuu9e-I/AAAAAAAAck8/Q13MaOnS6_U/s400/symptoms-of-dehydration-in-adults.jpg\" width=\"378\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water is the lubricant\nof all moving parts in the body.&nbsp; All\ncells are water cooled. The dry air of the airplane cabin wicks moisture away\nfrom the skin and can cause acute water loss if not properly managed .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A very\nimportant tip to prevent jet lag is applying skin moisturizer to minimize\ndehydration. Often, dehydration symptoms alone present as jet lag. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LoLDFr9THb8/UQgrF0dw4bI/AAAAAAAAclM/JdUTSAp-ZHY/s1600/downloadtt5qwww.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"251\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-LoLDFr9THb8/UQgrF0dw4bI/AAAAAAAAclM/JdUTSAp-ZHY/s320/downloadtt5qwww.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Drink plenty of water to remain hydrated. To\navoid the uncomfortable feeling of \u201cjet-belly\u201d do not drink anything with\nbubbles because all gasses expand during flight causing acute abdominal\ndistention (bloating).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Airplane food is typically\nhigh in fat, salt, and sugar, and low in carbohydrates. &nbsp;It is difficult to digest in flight with your\nintestines all swollen from the airplane's low air pressure. &nbsp;Avoid alcohol and coffee; they have diuretic\nproperties, i.e., they squeeze water out of your cells. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fhQDpThTnD0/UQgq4svtw1I/AAAAAAAAclE/oc6MKvJRDXk/s1600/imagesyuu6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"238\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fhQDpThTnD0/UQgq4svtw1I/AAAAAAAAclE/oc6MKvJRDXk/s320/imagesyuu6.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For humidified breathing air, cover your nose\nwith a water-saturated cotton handkerchief. (Fold on the diagonal and wrap ends\naround your ear). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After landing, take a\nshower or soak in the water tub as soon as possible. &nbsp;Bathing when dehydrated helps to replenish\nmoisture right through the pores and relaxes the nervous system.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X7hy4HB5NEg/UQgrXnUUBMI/AAAAAAAAclU/dM27-jEVrgE/s1600/imagesttr44e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-X7hy4HB5NEg/UQgrXnUUBMI/AAAAAAAAclU/dM27-jEVrgE/s400/imagesttr44e.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During a 3\nhour flight your body can lose up to 1.5 litres of water, then you can do the\nmath on how much water to drink by the length of your flight.&nbsp; &nbsp;Use\nsaline eye drops during the flight to prevent dry eyes and use a saline nasal\nspray too.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Air gets rarified as\nyou go higher up.&nbsp; As you go higher the\noxygen content which is 20.8% at the surface of the earth gets less.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore\neach breath of air that you breathe at, for example, 15,000 feet above sea\nlevel has about half the amount of oxygen of a breath taken at sea level.&nbsp; Airplane cabins that are pressurized to\naccommodate an altitude of &nbsp;8,000 feet or\nhigher will decrease the oxygen level in the blood. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The air that you breathe during a flight is\nthe air that is outside your window, although the air is modified and\ncompressed before being pumped into the cabin. This air is more akin to the\nthin rarified mountain air we breathe on high mountains.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The already lesser\noxygen of the pressurized air can have the same effects that low-oxygen does on\nearth. ie light headedness, difficulty in concentrating, shallow breathing,\nloss of math skills, aches in joints, impaired vision and other maladies . As\naltitude increases, the body becomes less and less efficient due to lesser\noxygen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You may be aware that completely deprived of oxygen, the human body\ndies in 8 minutes. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although the proportion\nof gases such as oxygen, nitrogen and carbon dioxide remains the same in the\natmosphere no matter the altitude, as you go higher the partial pressure of\neach decreases. Oxygen deficiency, which is technically known as hypoxia,\noccurs when there is a decrease in the partial pressure of inspired oxygen\n(PIO2 ), such as happens in an aircraft .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The PIO2 at sea level is 150 mmHg; at\naltitude it can fall to 60 mmHg, decreasing the oxygen level in the blood to 89\npercent or below. &nbsp;Of all the tissue\ncells, the brain cells are the most sensitive to lack of oxygen. The areas of\nthe brain most affected at low cabin altitudes are those associated with the\npowers of judgement, self-criticism and accurate performance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon monoxide,\nthe chief component in tobacco smoke of passive smokers , has 300 times greater\naffinity for haemoglobin than oxygen, and therefore will displace it readily to\nform carboxy-hemoglobin. &nbsp;It is a good\nthing that aircrafts now ban smoking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TVn6ENCGgmg/UQgtWfB98-I/AAAAAAAAclk/2fUxv2SCSKY/s1600/imagesbjkkkll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TVn6ENCGgmg/UQgtWfB98-I/AAAAAAAAclk/2fUxv2SCSKY/s1600/imagesbjkkkll.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypoxia is defined as a\nlack of sufficient oxygen in the body cells or tissues. The higher the\naltitude, the greater the sleep disruption. &nbsp;Generally, sleep disturbance becomes greater\nat altitudes of 13,000 feet or more. &nbsp;The\ndisturbance is caused by diminished oxygen levels and accompanying changes in\nrespiration.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This may makes you slightly lethargic, resulting in a higher risk\nof more severe jet lag symptoms.&nbsp; If the\nflyer has an underlying medical condition, such as anemia or heart disease,\nhaving less oxygen may worsen jet lag symptoms even more.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f2wSoYlntHs/UQguGH4RIWI/AAAAAAAAcls/0Vac2hdiNyc/s1600/downloadffgh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"296\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-f2wSoYlntHs/UQguGH4RIWI/AAAAAAAAcls/0Vac2hdiNyc/s320/downloadffgh.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aircraft which have partially recirculated air have a higher humidity level ( breathing and perspiration of\npassengers ) than those with only a 100-percent fresh airflow\u2014but then the\nquality of this air is very poor.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What with so many\npassengers in the plane - with some of them farting continuously and\nhyper ventilating passengers breathing out too much carbon-di-oxide..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Man\u2019s &nbsp;body is equipped to operate at greatest\nefficiency within relatively narrow limits of atmospheric pressure and, through\nyears of habit, has adapted itself to movement on the ground.&nbsp;&nbsp; As the plane gains altitude, the air\npressure drops. &nbsp;At 5,500 metres, it is\nonly half of the pressure at sea level, at 11,000 metres\u2014only a quarter. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the cabin interior, the pressure is always\nequivalent to that at a height of 2,500 metres. &nbsp;The Concorde was an exception with higher cabin\npressure differential.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The difference between\nthe two pressures, outside and inside an aircraft cabin, is called the cabin\npressure differential. The engines of jet airliners compress air as part of\ntheir operation. The air, which is bled from each engine, enters the fuselage\nthroughout the flight to keep the pressure constant.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are outflow valves\nto control the expulsion of air and to protect the aircraft itself from\nexcessive differential pressures. Too great a difference in the outside and\ninside pressures and, as in the case of the balloon or bicycle tyre, the plane\nwould either burst or crumple in on itself.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During ascent or\ndescent when the plane is below that height, the cabin pressure varies\naccording to the air outside, and the pressure in your middle ear adapts\naccordingly (often noticeable by a crackling noise). These pressurization\nchanges may cause discomfort in your ears during climb or descent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can\nrelieve this discomfort by yawning, swallowing hard or chewing gum. You can\nalso pinch your nose and force air into it with your mouth shut. This will\nre-open the passage linking the middle ear with the pharynx and relieve the\npressure. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you are travelling with a\nbad cold, nose drops in both nostrils during take off and landing will ease the\nswelling of the mucous membrane and allow the pressure in the middle ear to\nadapt more easily.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body contains a\nnumber of gas-filled cavities such as the ears, sinuses, lungs and stomach,\nwhich communicate with the surrounding atmosphere. In accordance with Boyle\u2019s\nLaw, the gas will expand on ascent in an aircraft by about 35 percent, and\nwhile there is unrestricted access between the cavities and the surrounding\natmosphere, this expansion will occur unnoticed. However, if this pressure\nbuild-up cannot be relieved it may cause considerable pain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/0jyxhozq89g/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/0jyxhozq89g&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/0jyxhozq89g&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br />\n<i><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">See video above &nbsp;how many of you think Freemason Charles Darwin and his evolved monkey gang will understand this?</span></b></i><br />\n<i><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></i>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FLk6jItN4hM/UQii17nmAjI/AAAAAAAAcp8/Y-CO2IRGMOs/s1600/ndw.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-FLk6jItN4hM/UQii17nmAjI/AAAAAAAAcp8/Y-CO2IRGMOs/s1600/ndw.gif\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ear is composed of\nthree sections. The outer ear is the auditory canal and ends at the eardrum.\nThe middle ear is a cavity surrounded by bones of the skull and is filled with\nair. The Eustachian tube connects the middle ear to the throat. The inner ear\nis used for hearing and certain equilibrium senses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As one ascends or\ndescends, air must escape or be replenished through the Eustachian tube to\nequalize the pressure in the middle ear cavity with that of the atmosphere. If\nair is trapped in the middle ear, the eardrum stretches to absorb the higher\npressure. The result is pain and sometimes temporary deafness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During climbs, there is\nlittle problem since excess air escapes through the tube easily. However,\nduring descents, when pressure in the middle ear must be increased. The\nEustachian tubes do not open readily. The passengers must consciously make an\neffort to swallow or yawn to stimulate the muscular action of the tubes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes it is\nadvisable to use the Valsalva technique, that is, to close the mouth, hold the\nnose and blow gently. This action forces air up the Eustachian tubes.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IZSt43BIEZA/UQieWx32kNI/AAAAAAAAcpk/i6XZYxAQlKc/s1600/dfg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IZSt43BIEZA/UQieWx32kNI/AAAAAAAAcpk/i6XZYxAQlKc/s400/dfg.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children may suffer\nsevere pain because of ear blocks during descents. They should be repeatedly\nreminded to swallow or yawn. Small babies are incapable of voluntarily\nadjusting the pressure in the middle ear and should be given a bottle to suck\nduring descents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Painful ear block\ngenerally occurs; as a result of too rapid descent. Some stupid pilots descend\ntoo fast causing a great deal of grief to small babies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ePak0EYPm6I/UQinacI40wI/AAAAAAAAcqM/1_3tacBo1Lo/s1600/imagesghjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ePak0EYPm6I/UQinacI40wI/AAAAAAAAcqM/1_3tacBo1Lo/s1600/imagesghjk.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alcohol is absorbed\nvery rapidly into the blood and tissues of the body. Alcohol is absorbed into the fluid of the inner ear and stays there after it\nhas gone from the blood and brain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://3.gvt0.com/vi/vTiGskc1o48/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/vTiGskc1o48&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/vTiGskc1o48&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the inner ear monitors; balance,\nalcohol there can be responsible for incorrect balance information and possibly\nspatial disorientation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fGxbKkbr9pY/UQinepMMf3I/AAAAAAAAcqU/l_7k9DF1FoE/s1600/img0101323558308059.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fGxbKkbr9pY/UQinepMMf3I/AAAAAAAAcqU/l_7k9DF1FoE/s400/img0101323558308059.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The presence of alcohol\nin the blood interferes with the normal use of oxygen by the tissues\n(histotoxic hypoxia). Because of reduced pressure at high altitudes and the\nreduced ability of the haemoglobin to absorb oxygen, the effect of alcohol in\nthe blood, during flight at high altitudes, is much more pronounced than at sea\nlevel. The effects of one drink are magnified 2 to 3 times over the effects the\nsame drink would have at sea level.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Infection of the inner\near, that is a common symptom of a cold, can also produce severe vertigo. The\ntissue around the nasal end of the Eustachian tube will quite likely be swollen\nand middle ear problems associated, under normal conditions , with descent from\naltitude will be severely aggravated. A perforated eardrum is a possible\nresult. Although a perforated eardrum usually heals soon, in some cases\nthere is permanent hearing impairment or prolonged infection of the middle ear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pFwD7N2kUcQ/UQiw4dkNSbI/AAAAAAAAcr8/K064E9JBCMM/s1600/gjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pFwD7N2kUcQ/UQiw4dkNSbI/AAAAAAAAcr8/K064E9JBCMM/s400/gjk.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you look out of\nthe window in daylight , the sunlight is reflected is back into your eyes by\ncloud tops. This light contains more of the damaging blue and ultra-violet\nwavelengths than are encountered on the surface of the earth.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolonged\nexposure can cause damage to the eye and especially to the lens. Sunglasses\nshould, be worn to, &nbsp;provide\nprotection against these dangers and to prevent eyestrain in case you are the type who wants to look out from the window.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bhr2fvXBE2k/UQizOZm9D6I/AAAAAAAAcsE/AcgMIV3CNAY/s1600/imagescfggh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bhr2fvXBE2k/UQizOZm9D6I/AAAAAAAAcsE/AcgMIV3CNAY/s1600/imagescfggh.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nJet lag, is termed desynchronosis in medical parlance.&nbsp;&nbsp; It results from alterations to the body's\ncircadian rhythms resulting from rapid long-distance transmeridian (east to\nwest or west to east) travel on a jet aircraft. &nbsp;It is a physiological condition and has to be\nprevented or managed with this in mind.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nTransmeridian flights in excess of three time zones can\nresult in significant circadian rhythm disruption. When flying in a westerly\ndirection the day is lengthened. When flying east, against the direction of the\nsun, the day is shortened.<o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-IFCpMKRhcdY/UQi5C1h3BII/AAAAAAAAcsc/QQK4hjJGBwA/s1600/imageshjkl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"212\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-IFCpMKRhcdY/UQi5C1h3BII/AAAAAAAAcsc/QQK4hjJGBwA/s400/imageshjkl.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The traveller\u2019s body\nclock will be out of synchronization with the destination time, as it\nexperiences daylight and darkness contrary to the rhythms to which it has grown\naccustomed. The body's natural comfort zone pattern is upset, as the rhythms\nthat dictate times for eating, sleeping, hormone regulation and body\ntemperature variations no longer correspond to the environment , nor to each\nother. Resetting the circadian clock can be difficult.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body operates with\nmany circadian rhythms, such as body temperature regulation, endocrine (gland\nand hormone) function, airway function, and kidney (renal) function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jet-lag is not\npsychological; it is cycle logical. All our internal cycles (temperature,\nsleep, cravings for sweets, reactions to medications) are programmable, like\ncomputers. For instance, body temperature slowly rises throughout the day,\ndrops dramatically around midnight, and begins to rise again before 6 a.m. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mental alertness and\nthe propensity to fall asleep are regulated by circadian rhythm. There are two\npeak times of day at which a person is most susceptible to falling asleep, 3\na.m. to 5 a.m. and 3 p.m. to 5 p.m. Most people have experienced the urge to\nfall asleep in the late afternoon, after eating lunch. It is not necessarily\nthe food that makes people want to fall asleep at this time, but the time of\nday.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the rhythms\nmentioned above occur in humans within a cycle of approximately 24.5 hours.\nThese natural rhythms occur even in the absence of daylight or darkness.\nStudies in which people live without any way of knowing what time of day it is\nhave shown that these people continue to follow a 24-hour schedule. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That is, they sleep for\nabout eight hours, and their waking activity levels correlate with those found\nfor individuals under normal conditions of time and light-dark cycles. It seems\nthe influence of circadian rhythm is unavoidable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People naturally\nsynchronize their internal clocks with day-night cycles, which allows them to\nbe awake during the day and to sleep during the night. The body regulates this\nchiefly through the eyes. Light stimulates nerves in the retina that pass a\nsignal through a chain of nerves to the brain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some of these nerves\nfeed the hypothalamus, a part of the brain that regulates body temperature,\nwater and sugar ratios, and fluid secretions and which houses the\nsuprachiasmatic nucleus, a bundle of nerves that controls the body's circadian\nrhythms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hypothalamus like a\nalarm clock regulates our sleep cycles, as well as many other body processes\nsuch as body temperature, hunger, thirst, blood pressure, and the level of\nhormones and glucose in the bloodstream.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A disruption to the\ncircadian rhythm affects alertness, appetite, and hormone secretion because the\nhypothalamus is unable to immediately recover to a change in the environment.\nThese interactions are responsible for the majority of the symptoms of jet\nlag...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When bright light\nstimulates the optic nerves, the optic nerves send the signal to the\nsuprachiasmatic nucleus, which then triggers circadian rhythms, resulting in\nthe synchronization of the body's 24-hour cycle with the earth's 24 hour cycle.\nWhen the eye of an air traveler perceives dawn or dusk many hours earlier or\nlater than usual, the hypothalamus may trigger activities that the rest of the\nbody is not ready for, and jet lag occurs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5eZIiTpGl0k/UQizVTLwrHI/AAAAAAAAcsM/aVeB_UaEiRw/s1600/Circadian_rhythm_labeled.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5eZIiTpGl0k/UQizVTLwrHI/AAAAAAAAcsM/aVeB_UaEiRw/s400/Circadian_rhythm_labeled.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jet-lag affects us\nphysically, mentally, and emotionally. A physical example is swollen feet and\nabdomen distension. . A mental example is disorientation. An emotional one is\nanxiety.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is travel fatigue\nas the passenger is sitting in a cramped space, usually sharing elbow room with\nstrangers&nbsp; with little chance to move\naround and the concept&nbsp; of time is disoriented.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jet lag effects\ninclude&nbsp; confusion, dehydration,\nheadache, irritability, nausea, dizziness, lethargy, fatigue mild depression,\nunsettled feeling , decreased awareness and attention deficit. Meals, sleep,\nbowel habits, and other daily routines are all pushed either side.. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wOcS5f5DglA/UQjWRddM7aI/AAAAAAAAc0I/lV6_Dw0dGC4/s1600/master_clock.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"435\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-wOcS5f5DglA/UQjWRddM7aI/AAAAAAAAc0I/lV6_Dw0dGC4/s640/master_clock.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eastward travel is\nassociated with difficulty falling asleep at the destination bedtime and\ndifficulty arising in the morning. Westward travel is associated with early\nevening sleepiness and predawn awakening at the travel destination. Travelers\nflying within the same time zone typically experience the fewest problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your body clock\ncontrols your sleeping and waking pattern.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also affects your hunger, digestion, bowel habits, urine production,\nbody temperature and blood pressure.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sunlight is a big\ncomponent of your internal body clock.&nbsp;\nWhen the sun goes down, your brain induces melatonin, your\nsleep-stimulating hormone.&nbsp; The retina, a\nlayer at the back of your eyeball, captures light and is used to receiving a\nregular amount of sunlight in your local time zone.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LWJ5Z8WwqMs/UQi4pz8SRTI/AAAAAAAAcsU/PX-N43ey3nw/s1600/imagesfghj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"260\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LWJ5Z8WwqMs/UQi4pz8SRTI/AAAAAAAAcsU/PX-N43ey3nw/s400/imagesfghj.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hi tech\n\u201csunglasses\u201d,&nbsp; \u201ctime control\u201d spectacles,\nwhich can imitate sunlight patterns inside aircraft has been developed.&nbsp; The glasses emit a soft green glow that helps\na traveler adapt to changing sleep patterns and time zones in \u201csmall steps\u201d.&nbsp; Sunlight is the primary environmental influence\nthat regulates the internal clock and the associated late-night melatonin\npulse. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The earth's magnetic\nfield is also be an environmental signal affecting circadian rhythms in\nhumans.&nbsp; When shielded from the earth's\nambient magnetic field, human circadian rhythms become disrupted</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-f8p5cfxLU5Q/UQi5R_9OcII/AAAAAAAAcsk/vq0zA0tOEfg/s1600/Dagcyclus.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"464\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-f8p5cfxLU5Q/UQi5R_9OcII/AAAAAAAAcsk/vq0zA0tOEfg/s640/Dagcyclus.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin tablets which are used to manage jet lag , are available\nwithout doctors &nbsp;prescription and selling like hot cakes&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The\nPharma lobby tells you that these tablets are safe.</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>OH YEAH?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">First of all, Melatonin is a sleep and body clock regulator \u2013 NOT a sleep initiator.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin works with your biological clock by telling your brain when it is time to sleep. Melatonin does not increase your sleep drive or need for sleep.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your melatonin levels\ncan be tested with a blood test, urine test or saliva test. &nbsp;The melatonin is also produced in the retina,\nthe skin, and the GI tract, but this is not the melatonin what affects your\nbiological sleep clock. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin in pill form\ndoes not function like your body\u2019s naturally produced melatonin. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It affects the brain in bursts and rapidly\nleaves the system, instead of the slow build-up and slow wash-out that your\nbody\u2019s naturally produced melatonin experiences.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">If Melatonin tablets are safe I dare any doctor to prescribe it to a pregnant woman or a woman who\nis nursing . &nbsp;</b></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bvn6m_VqRn8/UQi80WFHhdI/AAAAAAAAcuM/wF3qRHjUfPc/s1600/jhjgg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women who are pregnant, &nbsp;nursing or attempting to become pregnant should\navoid melatonin supplements. &nbsp;Excessive\nmelatonin use during pregnancy usually lead to developmental disorders in the\nbaby, and high levels of melatonin may have a contraceptive effect on those\nhoping to conceive. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men using the\nsupplement may notice a decrease in sperm count, decreased sperm mobility and\nincreased breast size ( tuft titties ) . &nbsp;Both men and women will experience a decrease\nin sex drive. &nbsp;Melatonin supplements may\nincrease cholesterol .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patients with type 1 diabetes have reported elevated\nblood sugar levels while taking melatonin. Even low doses of melatonin may\nreduce glucose tolerance and insulin sensitivity. Arrhythmia ( irregular\nheartbeat ) is often associated with regular use of melatonin supplements. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aLRDt3rsRic/UQi8-TpLVrI/AAAAAAAAcuU/eftmlq4PJVg/s1600/downloadkkjjhbbvc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-aLRDt3rsRic/UQi8-TpLVrI/AAAAAAAAcuU/eftmlq4PJVg/s320/downloadkkjjhbbvc.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin supplements have also been linked to\nan increased risk of autoimmune disorders such as autoimmune hepatitis, and\neven to triggering Crohn's disease ( bowel inflammation ) symptoms. According\nto MedlinePlus, users have reported stomach cramping, nausea and vomiting. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin is a hormone.\nIt tells your body that it\u2019s nighttime and it\u2019s time to go to bed. It is not an\nherb, a vitamin, a medicine or a mineral. Hormones are naturally produced by\nyour body as you need them. Which means it is very unlikely that someone has a\nmelatonin deficiency\u2014unless you are trying to beat jet lag with it in a stupid\nmanner.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While a melatonin supplement could be considered natural, in most\ncases, it doesn\u2019t come from the earth. There are exceptions of foods that\ncontain melatonin, but this is totally a different type of NATURAL melatonin , SANS SIDE EFFECTS than what\nis produced in by your pineal gland.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin can have side\neffects. &nbsp;Doses of melatonin (2-3 mg or\nhigher) have reported side effects of headaches, nausea, next- day grogginess, hormone\nfluctuations and nightmares<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-YMpYxi7ATeQ/UQi_CwYA3UI/AAAAAAAAcuc/zd5fnk2UcVw/s1600/ty99.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: left;\">\nThis means now I must explain Melatonin in greater detail. &nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HdSdMxXdUxs/UQi_lSd934I/AAAAAAAAcus/4dHI5G40UQ0/s1600/downloadhjjii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\nThe Shiva Lingam which produced Melatonin or rather converts Serotonin to Melatonin , is the pineal gland of Shiva.</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bbyo7T4y2JM/UQi_MLKAa-I/AAAAAAAAcuk/dmehGHEHI8g/s1600/downloadLOOJH.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
