text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I said before--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our sleep is regulated\nby the production of the hormone melatonin. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The perception of darkness alerts the\nhypothalamus to secrete melatonin which promotes sleep and the perception of\nlight forces the hypothalamus to withhold melatonin. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The hypothalamus cannot\nreadjust its schedule instantly, &nbsp;when\nshifted half way across the globe. It takes several days. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin is manufactured in the pineal gland\nfrom tryptophan, and its synthesis and release are stimulated by darkness and\nsuppressed by light. This means, the secretion of melatonin is responsible for\nsetting our sleep-wake cycle. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body clock is\nadjusted to the solar day by rhythmic cues in the environment, mainly the\nlight-dark cycle, and the rhythmic secretion of melatonin. The hormone Melatonin\nis also produced in the gastrointestinal tract. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sheep that normally breed only once per year\ncan be tricked into having two breeding seasons by treatment with melatonin.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>You\ncan trick hens to lay two eggs a day, by putting ON/OFF &nbsp;a bright white light.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0Kv37TQfa5M/UQjNFZD27PI/AAAAAAAAcyM/dhoZ7EhjYfs/s1600/ghji.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0Kv37TQfa5M/UQjNFZD27PI/AAAAAAAAcyM/dhoZ7EhjYfs/s320/ghji.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin is a natural\nsedative. The brain releases melatonin only during times when the level of\nlight is low. Melatonin is released during darkness even by animals that are\nnocturnal. &nbsp;Melatonin is also a free\nradical scavenger and an antioxidant.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pineal gland is large in children but\nshrinks at puberty. &nbsp;It appears to play a\nmajor role in sexual development, hibernation in animals, metabolism and\nseasonal breeding. &nbsp;The retina in the eye\ntransmits information on light exposure to the pineal gland. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pineal gland uses this information to\ncoordinate the human biological clock. &nbsp;Melatonin\nis secreted by the pineal gland at night to help induce sleep, while light\nexposure inhibits melatonin production. During the day, melatonin secretion is\nalmost zero.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin is\nresponsible for metabolism, sexual development and for regulating other\nhormones in the body. Pineal function can be affected by environmental stresses\nsuch as abnormal light and dark rhythms, temperature oscillations, radiation,\nhigh altitude and even magnetic fields.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electromagnetic fields\n(EMF) suppress the activity of the pineal gland and reduce melatonin\nproduction.&nbsp; EMF activity therefore\ndisrupts the bodies circadian rhythms.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pineal gland\ncalcifies with age and melatonin production correspondingly decreases. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Decline in melatonin is the trigger for the\naging process, for Melatonin is the super oxidant of&nbsp; nature. &nbsp;Serotonin, keeps you happy and in a balanced\nmental state of mind. &nbsp;PROZAC raises\nserotonin. The pineal gland is a photosensitive organ and thus an important timekeeper\nfor the human body<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chemically, you'll\nnotice on a bottle of melatonin supplements that it says\nN-acetyl-5-methoxytryptamine. &nbsp;However,\nnatural melatonin is made from the brain tissue of cows. So how many vegetarians\nknow about this?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember mad cow\ndisease a few years back?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Were you warned, by the Pharma industry monopolized by Big Brother ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That's the risk of taking natural\nmelatonin. &nbsp;Melatonin safety for\nlong-term use is dangerous, for frequent flyers . It is, after all, a hormone. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And just like early\nstudies reported benefits of estrogen use in women, which turned out to be a\ncomplicated mess, there is no way of knowing how long-term use of melatonin\nsupplements will effect a human being. &nbsp;&nbsp;The American Academy of Sleep Medicine does\nnot approve of the use of melatonin supplements unless administered under the\ndirection of a doctor. &nbsp;In Europe,\nmelatonin supplements are only available by prescription. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ez7dnjCOYm4/UQjFNp3cTHI/AAAAAAAAcwc/N2Womk1Axiw/s1600/imagesMJUUYTF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"249\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ez7dnjCOYm4/UQjFNp3cTHI/AAAAAAAAcwc/N2Womk1Axiw/s400/imagesMJUUYTF.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Synthesis and release\nof melatonin is stimulated by darkness and inhibited by light. But even without\nvisual cues, the level of melatonin in the blood rises and falls on a daily\n(circadian) cycle with peak levels occurring in the wee hours of the morning. .\nThe maximum amount of melatonin released in the bloodstream of the elderly is\nonly half of that in young adults. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-thpKJj5rL8c/UQjFt5jxlSI/AAAAAAAAcwk/nLfMd7hSeLU/s1600/downloadkkjhtr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-thpKJj5rL8c/UQjFt5jxlSI/AAAAAAAAcwk/nLfMd7hSeLU/s1600/downloadkkjhtr.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At sunset, the\ncessation of light triggers neural signals which stimulate the pineal gland to\nbegin releasing melatonin.&nbsp; In my home &nbsp;you will NOT &nbsp;see white fluorescent tube lights. &nbsp;Have you ever seen white tube lights in any 5\nstar hotel-- like in a Mumbai Irani restaurant?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZXyd4ltnBxE/UQjFGWG5r8I/AAAAAAAAcwU/wQj9WkXAhz4/s1600/imagesnhgtt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"212\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZXyd4ltnBxE/UQjFGWG5r8I/AAAAAAAAcwU/wQj9WkXAhz4/s400/imagesnhgtt.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This rise continues for\nhours, eventually peaking around 2 a.m. (3 a.m. for the elderly) after which it\nsteadily declines to minimal levels by morning. &nbsp;The delay in timing and decrease in intensity\nof the melatonin pulse is a manifestation of the aging process.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melatonin secretion\nnaturally drops off with age. This decrease is so reliable that blood melatonin\nlevels have been proposed as a measurement of biological age. This age-related\nreduction in melatonin levels may partially account for the reason many older\npeople have difficulty sleeping at night, and for why they are so fatigued\nduring the day. This is called age-induced \"jet-lag.\" TEE HEEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Europe, melatonin at\nvery high doses has been used as a contraceptive.&nbsp;&nbsp; With circadian enhancers like melatonin, the\ntiming is critical. When taken in opposition to the body's natural circadian\nrhythm, they cause cognitive deficit just like jet-lag does. But when taken in\nsynchronization with the body's natural circadian rhythms, they enhance mental\nperformance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7fBs2z2HIW0/UQjStkCZE6I/AAAAAAAAcz4/7g2z7e2cPHc/s1600/200px-Serotonin-2D-skeletal.svg.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-7fBs2z2HIW0/UQjStkCZE6I/AAAAAAAAcz4/7g2z7e2cPHc/s1600/200px-Serotonin-2D-skeletal.svg.png\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within the pineal\ngland, serotonin is acetylated and then methylated to yield melatonin. <b><span style=\"color: red;\">Serotonin</span></b>\nworks by enhancing the mood, reducing pain and providing energy, and is a\nnatural stimulant. Serotonin is a precursor to melatonin, meaning the body can\nconvert serotonin into melatonin, which is then stored in the pineal gland.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Serotonin is a\nneurotransmitter whose deficiency is associated with depression. Serotonin is\ntargeted in the treatment of depression, but is not prescribed in its native\nform. Serotonin cannot pass the blood-brain barrier, so serotonin itself does\nnot enhance mood . Instead, many medications for depression are aimed at\nstopping the breakdown of serotonin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pineal gland of the\nbrain sits outside the blood-brain barrier, meaning that melatonin can be used\nin its native form. Serotonin is a natural stimulant. Melatonin is a sedative\nderived from serotonin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">An inadequate supply or\ninefficient use of either neurotransmitter is linked to mental illness.\nDepression can result from deficient serotonin or excessive melatonin\nproduction. Too much serotonin or too little melatonin can result in insomnia.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Move around on the\nplane on long flights to promote mental and physical acuity, as well as protect\nagainst deep vein thrombosis. Wear comfortable shoes and clothing.&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep, if possible, during long flights.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Travelers should e</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">at a bit less\nin-flight because the cabin pressure puts an extra strain on the digestive\nprocess. Many airlines have started serving their meals according to the\ndestination's time zone .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Refrain also from\ndrinking carbonated beverages or eating gas producing foods like beans.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep on board if your\nflight lands in the morning and avoid sleeping on board if your flight lands in\nthe evening When you first arrive, schedule work or other important activity at\na time when you are likely to have maximum energy, (i.e., in the evenings,\nafter jetting east, or in the mornings, after jetting west)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid situations requiring critical decision making, such\nas important meetings, for the first day after arrival.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a ship-captain this\nis impossible most of the time, as after a hectic taking over, the ship has to\nbe navigated out of port through busy lanes. After 30 years in command , I can vouch this is UNSAFE. All it requires is a hotel stay before going on board.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Uu5vgx0Oyow/UQjWHyIBSZI/AAAAAAAAc0A/OjrliZwelxs/s1600/hkl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Uu5vgx0Oyow/UQjWHyIBSZI/AAAAAAAAc0A/OjrliZwelxs/s320/hkl.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These problems which affect safety of life has NOT yet been addressed by the Maritime world, which is ruled by jack asses.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Grace and peace!-- trying playing this video below ( 20000 watts ) in a discotheque with BOSE speakers.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/KPwNBbvjIc4/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/KPwNBbvjIc4&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/KPwNBbvjIc4&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\nThe Sanskrit chants are 7000\nyears old. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i>Guru Brahma Gurur Vishnu<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i>Guru Devo Maheshwaraha<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i>Guru Saakshat Para Brahma<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i>Tasmai Sree Gurave Namaha<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMeaning: &nbsp;Guru is\nverily the representative of Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva. He creates, sustains\nknowledge and destroys the weeds of ignorance. I salute such a Guru.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\nAkhanda Mandalaakaaram<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\nVyaaptam Yenam charaacharam<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\nTatpadam Darshitam Yena<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\nTasmai Sri Gurave Namaha.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMeaning: &nbsp;Guru can\nguide us to the supreme knowledge of THAT which pervades all the living and\nnon-living beings in the entire Universe (namely Brahman). &nbsp;I salute such a Guru.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i>Agnyaana Timiraandhasya<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i>Gnyaana Anjana Shalaakayaa<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i>Chakshuhu Unmeelitam Yenam<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: normal;\">\n<i>Tasmai Sri Gurave Namaha.<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nMeaning: &nbsp;A Guru can\nsave us from the pangs of ignorance (darkness) by applying on us the balm of\nknowledge or awareness of the Supreme, I salute such a Guru.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYou will notice they are different from the modern <span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>BEAT IT, &nbsp;BEAT IT</b></span> or for the matter <span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>BABE BABE BABE</b>&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-APpG2M2OdlM/UQjaADldwHI/AAAAAAAAc0Q/-Ry88451QZ4/s1600/PAA7140036.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "24", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/2063866183582420727/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "1239310337629055957", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2013-01-27T10:06:00+05:30", "updated": "2014-03-20T12:36:36+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxMzk1Mjk5MTk2MzEwCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/exploring-mind-of-con-man-capt-ajit.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1239310337629055957", "title": "EXPLORING THE MIND OF A CON MAN - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YKnqMbxqWYM/UyqR0jZaXWI/AAAAAAAAqd8/4aJiTXmGprs/s1600/iydjemages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-YKnqMbxqWYM/UyqR0jZaXWI/AAAAAAAAqd8/4aJiTXmGprs/s1600/iydjemages.jpg\" height=\"226\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">EXPLORING THE MIND OF A CON MAN</span> , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\">THE &nbsp;DIAMOND HEIST AT ZAVERI BAZAR </span></b>- &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VOALigQbo3A/UQVdousfEtI/AAAAAAAAcbQ/TmKiG0RExHI/s1600/kjugnnn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VOALigQbo3A/UQVdousfEtI/AAAAAAAAcbQ/TmKiG0RExHI/s320/kjugnnn.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hundreds of con men\nhave walked this planet.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this post I intend\nto explore the mind of a con man \u2014 and underscore the unique psychology which\ndrives him.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Con men force you to\nhand over your moolah at your own free will. He does NOT use violence or force.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All con men are bound\nby a tight set of rules and it is so dang easy to spot them , before they do\nthe damage.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Con men are like rats\nwho shit in the same place , the same time \u2013 once you recognize their methods\nit is so easy to ambush and bushwhack them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Bollywood movie\n\u201cSpecial chabbis\" produced by Ekta Kapoor, directed by Neeraj Pandey ,\nstarring Akshay Kumar is being made , based on a sensational true heist at the\ndiamond store of Tribovandas Bhimji Zaveri at Hermes House Charni road on 19th\nMarch 1987.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yZNsQfKS8vc/UQTBwCLhQ8I/AAAAAAAAcIs/5s6yHaKnqxU/s1600/imagesghjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yZNsQfKS8vc/UQTBwCLhQ8I/AAAAAAAAcIs/5s6yHaKnqxU/s320/imagesghjk.jpg\" height=\"170\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Indian con-man\ngets my prize for circumventing the usual con man\u2019s run of the mill method. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This suave guy had his\nown style and did everything with panache. Usually con men get caught\u2014this man\njust walked away into the sunset with the moolah leaving an entire nation red\nfaced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A mystery man called\nMohan Singh, checked in at Taj Intercontinental at 5.30pm on March 17 1987 and\nsaid he was coming from Trivandrum.&nbsp;\nWithin 48 hours he would scoot with 35 lakhs worth of cash and\njewellery.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just before arrival at\nthe 5 star hotel hotel he inserted a classified advertisement in The Times of\nIndia seeking \"50 dynamic graduates\"&nbsp;\nfor the posts of RAW intelligence and CBI security officers.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The squeamish snooty\nhotel did NOT allow such a large scale interview, but this man appeared to be\nwell prepared.&nbsp; He shifted the interview\nto Mittal House Nariman Point ,&nbsp; as per\nplan B.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He interviewed more\nthan 100 candidates , out of which he selected only 28. They were recruited as\n'junior CBI officers'&nbsp; on 18th March .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a pep talk he\nordered to come to the hotel again today at 11am on 19th March 1987.&nbsp;&nbsp; They were NOT to reveal the selection or the\nprogramme to any friend of relative owing to the \"secrecy\"&nbsp; of the task.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GqGIbN4gjEM/UQSy-427IcI/AAAAAAAAcD0/jr9zWfMpvzY/s1600/bhkkl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GqGIbN4gjEM/UQSy-427IcI/AAAAAAAAcD0/jr9zWfMpvzY/s1600/bhkkl.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By noon, Mohan checked\nout of the hotel. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had booked a luxury coach through Taj hotel.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The recruits and the\ncon man proceeded towards Chowpatty in the coach at 12.30pm. &nbsp;Mohan Singh\nstopped the bus and told the driver and cleaner to wait while he took his staff\ntowards the beach ostensibly to have soft drinks and a pep talk.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mohan Singh distributed identity cards and at\nChowpatty briefed them about the mock raid operation.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bus then stopped in\nfront of Charni Road railway station and the \u201cCBI team\u201d foot slogged to the\njewellery shop. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a1c4hNQZitM/UQSxWwIKHeI/AAAAAAAAcDM/gMJR5h5bey4/s1600/ftyjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-a1c4hNQZitM/UQSxWwIKHeI/AAAAAAAAcDM/gMJR5h5bey4/s400/ftyjk.jpg\" height=\"243\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The arrived at the jewellery\nshop around 2.15 pm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mastermind strode straight with a swagger to owner\nPratapbhai Zevari, introduced himself as CBI officer Mohan Singh, and flashed a partly printed, partly handwritten authentic\nlooking search warrant. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With a practiced air, he\nordered that the close-circuit camera be shut and that the jeweller surrender\nhis licensed revolver. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No telephone calls were\nallowed as the recruits took samples of ornaments for investigation. The\njeweller was told that the CBI was investigating the quality of gold sold in\nsuch shops.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One eager beaver probationer was even asked to put up a board at the entrance stating\nthat a raid was on. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-HzyPbJHWBYA/UQSx6YNfzuI/AAAAAAAAcDU/rfM39WONn7A/s1600/imagesfhjj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The jeweller\naccompanied Singh and the others as they picked up assorted jewellery before\nsealing it in plastic packets with CBI seal and Ashoka insignia on it. &nbsp;Money was also collected from the cash counter\nand stashed into briefcases. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">35 &nbsp;minutes later, Singh asked two men to keep the\nheavy black resin bags into the waiting bus. &nbsp;The rest of the 26 officers were\nasked to guard the shop and continue searching for incriminating documents as our\ncon man Mohan Singh left to 'supervise' another imminent raid. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_CU1-E6QZXQ/UQSyPzFCIxI/AAAAAAAAcDs/6yQ0GtHjmvk/s1600/downloadjl;;.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">After four anxious\nhours, &nbsp;the sweating shop owners ,the\njunior officers , 70 odd staff and 30 customers realized that they had been duped.\n&nbsp;The jeweller immediately called the D B\nMarg police station. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">The owner was all the\ntime suspecting something amiss considering Mohan Singh wore a natty 3 piece\nsuit but had on, cheap bumpkin shoes.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kjo26X9hxMM/UQSyKZy-RmI/AAAAAAAAcDk/gyMfepZPueM/s1600/downloadvhjkl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">The suspicious owner had wanted to know why\nthe jewellery was being taken away. &nbsp;In a\nwell-rehearsed reply, Mohan Singh replied knee jerk , that section 22 of the\njewellers' constitution ( sic) ,&nbsp; gave\nCBI officers the right to seize ornaments in order to check their purity\u2014all\nbull.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The driver of the\nluxury bus when arrested said that the conman was dropped behind Taj hotel, (\nof Bade Mian sheek kabab and baida roti fame ) following which he vanished into\nthe hot afternoon . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mohan Singh had got off the\nbus went to the hotel , asked the bell boy to call a taxi, and put the bags\ninside the vehicle. &nbsp;The taxi headed\ntowards Vile Parle where he got down and melted into the crowd with his bags . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A massive manhunt was\nlaunched for him .&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire episode bore close resemblance to a pulsating crime\nfiction.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The suspect appeared to be from\nKerala in his early</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">forties, </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">dark-complexioned, with a thick&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">mustache</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">. </span></span></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He spoke good English with an unmistakable YEM\nYO YET YENTHER YO YEM south Indian accent.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
