line-height: 150%;\">He made 40 million\ndollars by scamming affluent people by masquerading as a French member of the\nRockefeller family.&nbsp; Actually Rockefeller\nwas the agent of big brother Rothschild who had a bloodline branch in France.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/xat9xSos_7g/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/xat9xSos_7g&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/xat9xSos_7g&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Wanna know more about the Rockefellers ? &nbsp;see video above.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His mother was a French prostitute and his father was an alcoholic house painter who\ntook Christopher to an orphanage in Saint-Germain-Village when the boy was 5,\nand then froze to death on the streets . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Young Chris ran away and made his way to Paris\nwhere he pulled his first big con, faking the deed to a property he didn't own,\nthen \"selling\" the property for USD $1.4 million.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Making his way to the\nUnited States, Rocancourt used at least a dozen aliases. He got the rich and\npowerful to invest in his schemes. He tapped into their inherent greed.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thinking he was a blue blood Rockefeller, the\nmoneyed elite flocked to Christopher, begging him to invest their fortunes for\nthem. Christopher complied, pretending he could double everyone's money in less\nthan two weeks, as long as they supplied him with a cash advance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He convinced them that\nhe, too, was rich by paying for their lavish dinners in cash, sometimes as\nlarge as 80000 dollars . He travelled in stretch limousines ,often with police\nescort&nbsp; that made others say, \u201cThat guy\u2019s\ngotta be a VIP.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He would say \u201c The name is Rockefeller,\u201d when asked his name,\nadding quickly and casually \u2014 \u201cBut please, call me Christopher.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gODd22eZxZ4/UQS8ukLfukI/AAAAAAAAcFc/Tz-UDQ1-j_A/s1600/ffds.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-gODd22eZxZ4/UQS8ukLfukI/AAAAAAAAcFc/Tz-UDQ1-j_A/s400/ffds.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"283\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>His movie with Naomi Campbell was shelved&nbsp;</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Rhonda Rydell</b>, his\ngorgeous playboy model girlfriend says \u201c He would just walk into a room and\neveryone at the table, who were high, influential people, would drool and gush\n\u201cOh, Christopher\u2019s here.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wHTvKbf9JKk/UQS_8KX0M6I/AAAAAAAAcHM/zDsthZV8Kfc/s1600/gh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wHTvKbf9JKk/UQS_8KX0M6I/AAAAAAAAcHM/zDsthZV8Kfc/s400/gh.jpg\" height=\"290\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The new money\nwannabes were thrilled to be rubbing elbows with an old money name<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even in the image-conscious\nHamptons, Christopher, who always had a gorgeous woman leaning on his arm, a\nsplash everywhere&nbsp; On a whim, he would\ncharter a chopper to race him out to a seaside estate he said he was thinking\nof buying.&nbsp; He was so rich, he could get\naway with his favorite uniform\u2014 jeans, a T-shirt and a baseball cap worn\nbackwards\u2014 even in the fanciest places.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The tabs topped out at\nthousands of dollars. Christopher always picked up the bill and always paid\ncash.The bubbly flowed, as did Christopher\u2019s non-stop chatter about his\nincredibly fabulous world.&nbsp; He had jets,\nhe had yachts, he had women coming from Monaco\u2026 and the cellphones were going\noff\u2014the Kennedys are on the line, and Prince Albert was in that weekend.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VEKUXbWOGx8/UQS8y-8wDnI/AAAAAAAAcFk/c0KB5Jcdv3k/s1600/imagesbnj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VEKUXbWOGx8/UQS8y-8wDnI/AAAAAAAAcFk/c0KB5Jcdv3k/s400/imagesbnj.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>As you can see in the picture above , he is a piece of shit with a PIGEON CHEST -- still he produced a child with Miss France.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He always had plenty\ncash money in his pocket. He passed out $100 bills to the waiters to the\nbartenders, to the valet parkers, to the press ... for them he was more than\nroyalty. \u201cChristopher,\u201d the paparazzi would scream when they wanted a picture\nof him leaving the clubs late at night.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rocancourt\u2014the French\nRockefeller with an accent so thick you sometimes need subtitles to understand\nhim explains \u201cThey smell ze money like the shark smell ze blood.&nbsp; Nothing else\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Los Angeles, he\npretended to be a movie producer, ex-boxing champion or venture capitalist. He\ndropped names like \"his mother\" Sophia Loren or \"his\nuncles\" Oscar de la Renta and Dino De Laurentiis and was associated with\nvarious celebrities.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He married Playboy model Pia Reyes; they had a son, Zeus.\nHe lived for a time with Mickey Rourke and apparently convinced actor\nJean-Claude Van Damme to produce his next movie.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PBO1AOvE8Ws/UQS8308Q1TI/AAAAAAAAcFs/PkCmRLOXL_I/s1600/sonia+rolland.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PBO1AOvE8Ws/UQS8308Q1TI/AAAAAAAAcFs/PkCmRLOXL_I/s400/sonia+rolland.jpg\" height=\"277\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Paris, Christophe\nRocancourt lived with former <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Miss France Sonia Rolland</b></span>. They had a daughter\ntogether, named Tess.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most children enjoy\nplaying make-believe, but Rocancourt made a profitable career of it. He sold\nhigh-end real estate he didn't actually own.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His house of cards\nbegan to collapse in 1997, and in 2002, he pleaded guilty to theft, bribery and\nother charges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In March 2002 he was\nextradited to New York and pleaded to charges of theft, grand larceny,\nsmuggling, bribery, perjury and fraud against 19 victims. He was fined $9\nmillion, was ordered to pay $1.2 million in restitution and sentenced to five\nyears in prison.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fjhgE7uJflA/UQTvEhKWQNI/AAAAAAAAcKM/Q3Io8dNscDA/s1600/225px-Frank_Abagnale_(cropped).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-fjhgE7uJflA/UQTvEhKWQNI/AAAAAAAAcKM/Q3Io8dNscDA/s1600/225px-Frank_Abagnale_(cropped).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me introduce a\ncelebrated con man<b><span style=\"color: red;\"> Frank William Abagnale, Jr&nbsp;</span></b>\nwhose life has been made into a Hollywood movie \u201cCatch Me If You Can\u201d in\n2002,&nbsp; where he is played by actor Leonardo\nDiCaprio.&nbsp; Abagnale himself makes a cameo\nas a French police officer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frank William Abagnale,\nJr was a con man of the first order.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He became one of the\nmost famous impostors ever, claiming to have assumed no fewer than eight\nseparate avatars as an airline pilot, a doctor, a U.S. Bureau of Prisons agent,\nand a lawyer.&nbsp; He escaped from police\ncustody twice (once from a taxiing airliner and once from a U.S. federal\npenitentiary), before he was 21 years old.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G8CKzBTnaOA/UQTv2D3hRrI/AAAAAAAAcK8/lPTdY--kTKw/s1600/imagesghko99.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G8CKzBTnaOA/UQTv2D3hRrI/AAAAAAAAcK8/lPTdY--kTKw/s1600/imagesghko99.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abagnale was one of\nfour children and spent the first sixteen years of his life in Bronxville, New\nYork. His French mother, Paulette, and father, Frank Abagnale Sr., divorced\nwhen he was 16.&nbsp; At the divorce hearing,\nAbagnale ran away never to see his father again.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His first con act was\nto screw his own father .&nbsp; His father\ngave him a gas credit card and a truck to assist him in commuting to his\npart-time job.&nbsp; Frank Jr. devised a scheme\nto help pay for his dates with women. He used the credit card to\n\"buy\" tires, batteries, and other car-related items at gas stations.\nHe made a deal with the attendants in which they gave him cash in return for\nthem keeping the products. Ultimately, his father was liable for a bill of\nseveral thousand dollars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abagnale's first\nconfidence trick was writing personal checks on his own overdrawn account.\nThis, however, would work for only a limited time before the bank demanded\npayment, so he moved on to opening other accounts in different banks,\neventually creating new identities to sustain this charade.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over time, he\nexperimented and developed different ways of defrauding banks, such as printing\nout his own almost-perfect copies of checks, depositing them and persuading\nbanks to advance him cash on the basis of money in his accounts.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6QuyNYUOLho/UQTvryI-naI/AAAAAAAAcKs/UgTeHzOCv6M/s1600/248px-Abagnale_and_Stewardess.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-6QuyNYUOLho/UQTvryI-naI/AAAAAAAAcKs/UgTeHzOCv6M/s1600/248px-Abagnale_and_Stewardess.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abagnale decided to\nimitate a pilot because he wanted to fly throughout the world for free. He got\na uniform by calling PanAm, telling them that he was a pilot working for them\nwho had lost his uniform, and going to get a new one with a fake employee\nID.&nbsp; He then forged an FAA pilot's\nlicense.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GaijPyg4fi4/UQTvoLgtxVI/AAAAAAAAcKk/JeoxsNT9kYk/s1600/ffgjooo.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GaijPyg4fi4/UQTvoLgtxVI/AAAAAAAAcKk/JeoxsNT9kYk/s400/ffgjooo.jpg\" height=\"265\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pan American World Airways\nestimated that between the ages of 16 and 18, Abagnale flew over 1,000,000\nmiles (1,600,000 km) on over 250 flights and flew to 26 countries, at Pan Am's\nexpense, by deadheading. He was also able to stay at hotels for free during\nthis time.&nbsp; Everything from food to\nlodging was billed to the airline company. Abagnale stated that he was often\ninvited by actual pilots to take the controls of the plane in-flight.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He forged a Columbia\nUniversity degree and taught sociology at Brigham Young University for a\nsemester, working as a teaching assistant by the name of Frank Adams.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For eleven months he\nimpersonated a chief resident pediatrician in a Georgia hospital under the\nalias Frank Conners.. After befriending a real doctor who lived in the same\napartment complex, he agreed to act as resident supervisor of interns as a\nfavor until the local hospital could find someone else to take the job.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-imAVLPJBeDs/UQTvxPgDbzI/AAAAAAAAcK0/DKq5IQE68cM/s1600/imagescgjop.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-imAVLPJBeDs/UQTvxPgDbzI/AAAAAAAAcK0/DKq5IQE68cM/s1600/imagescgjop.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nposition was not difficult for Abagnale because supervisors did no real medical\nwork. . He was able to fake his way through most of his duties by using humor\nmanagement and letting the interns handle the cases coming in during his\nlate-night shift, setting broken bones and other mundane tasks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abagnale forged a\nHarvard University law transcript, passed the bar exam of Louisiana and got a\njob at the Louisiana Attorney General's office at the age of nineteen. . After\nmaking a fake transcript from Harvard, he prepared himself for the compulsory\nexam.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite failing twice, he claims to have passed the bar exam legitimately\non the third try after eight weeks of study, because \"Louisiana at the\ntime allowed you to take the Bar over and over as many times as you needed. It\nwas really a matter of eliminating what you got wrong. You get an idea now how\nstupid the US law system is , right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was also known to\nuse disguises as part of a ruse and was a master of manipulation; he once even\neluded capture by posing as a federal agent. One of his most famous cons was\nusing a security guard uniform to steal cash meant to go into drop boxes in\nwhich companies placed their proceedings, having put a sign on the box saying\nit was out of service and telling attendants to hand the money bags to the\nattending security guard&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He later pondered aloud \"How in the name of\nCharles Bronson, can a drop box be out of service?\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beats me too!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abagnale was eventually\ncaught in France in 1969 when an Air France attendant he had dated in the past\nrecognized him and notified the police.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After his release he\napproached a bank with an offer. He explained to the bank what he had done, and\noffered to speak to the bank's staff and show various tricks that\n\"paperhangers\" use to defraud banks. His offer included the condition\nthat if they did not find his speech helpful, they would owe him nothing;\notherwise, they would owe him only $500 with an agreement that they would\nprovide his name to other banks. With that, he began a legitimate life as a\nsecurity consultant. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He later founded\nAbagnale &amp; Associates, which advises businesses on fraud. Abagnale is now a\nmillionaire through his legal fraud detection and avoidance consulting business\nbased in Tulsa, Oklahoma.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Abagnale also continues to advise the FBI, with whom\nhe has associated for over 35 years, by teaching at the FBI Academy and\nlecturing for FBI field offices throughout the country. According to his\nwebsite, more than 14,000 institutions have adopted Abagnale's fraud prevention\nprograms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NNXkO2DyoB0/UQTvYgdIi2I/AAAAAAAAcKU/s8e0oqwDSek/s1600/imagesjki87.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NNXkO2DyoB0/UQTvYgdIi2I/AAAAAAAAcKU/s8e0oqwDSek/s400/imagesjki87.jpg\" height=\"218\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I guess this is what\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>David Headley</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b> </b>too has done\u2014 get on the right side of the US law, never mind\nthat 164 people were shot down in India by Pakistani terrorists with his\nassistance. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Plea bargain means he will NOT name the CIA , and \"American friends in ISI\" who are neck deep in all these subversions.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KAFSAXgtGMc/UQTvjyGEcKI/AAAAAAAAcKc/7Zvr37Vn7HI/s1600/imagesdfgui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KAFSAXgtGMc/UQTvjyGEcKI/AAAAAAAAcKc/7Zvr37Vn7HI/s400/imagesdfgui.jpg\" height=\"302\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are promised a certain\nproduct, service, or outcome which is close to your heart , but it is &nbsp;never delivered. &nbsp;&nbsp;Which\nmeans that a con man does fraudulent business.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Ca_IJ2cN1G8/UQU8bU7IVvI/AAAAAAAAcMs/_No3bUduhdY/s1600/imagesxdewew.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Ca_IJ2cN1G8/UQU8bU7IVvI/AAAAAAAAcMs/_No3bUduhdY/s1600/imagesxdewew.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So what is the thumb\nrule? Whenever somebody flatters you, &nbsp;watch your wallet or your belongings . &nbsp;Flattery is normally a prelude to an unusual\nor out-of-the-ordinary request, which will follow.&nbsp; So next time a stranger or even a friend is\nEXTRA sweet to you, it is time to ponder- what is the fu#kin\u2019 catch? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flattery makes you feel\nall puffed up and great about yourself. &nbsp;You feel like the cat\u2019s whiskers . But this is\na set up so you\u2019ll agree more easily to whatever corny request or proposal\nwhich will comes next.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You are more likely to\nmake a bad decision when you are sort of feelin\u2019 overconfident. &nbsp;Flattery is one sure way to build your\nconfidence. &nbsp;Old women are more vulnerable\nto this.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A con man will build up a need\nin you. And the funny part is you would have never felt this need till then.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A compliment is normal,\nbut flattery is not. &nbsp;Flattery is\nnormally a prelude to an unusual or out-of-the-ordinary request.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The con man will establish\nhimself as an authority. He is smart enough to exploit characteristics of the\nhuman psyche such as greed, dishonesty, honesty, vanity, compassion, credulity,\nirresponsibility and gullibility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is now in a position\nto feed you with complicated information and mindless technical jargon that\ngets you overwhelmed, that you stop asking further questions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The kinds of techniques\na &nbsp;con man &nbsp;to build your greed and confidence in yourself\nand in him is situation based and what he reads of your personality. &nbsp;Once your confidence is high enough, &nbsp;you\u2019re in a most vulnerable position. That\u2019s\nhow you get conned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember this sociopath\nhas special skills to whip up your greed and your dark desire to jump the queue\nin a unfair manner. He persuades you to &nbsp;ignore common sense . Sociopaths have\ndeveloped these skills to the point of instinct.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The con men have in\ncommon is an ability to get their victims thinking emotionally,&nbsp; and getting your greed from observing and\nchecking the hard facts. He makes you ignore your inbuilt defences that no\nbusiness deal, no purchase, no request for payment should be taken at face\nvalue.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GLfoHPBuKZ4/UQU8XN5T8_I/AAAAAAAAcMk/YjMnLb7bEDs/s1600/imagesddee.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-GLfoHPBuKZ4/UQU8XN5T8_I/AAAAAAAAcMk/YjMnLb7bEDs/s1600/imagesddee.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most con games work\nbecause people are just plain greedy. They convince them that he has found a\nshortcut , all under the cover of secrecy ,&nbsp;\nto a treasure under the rainbow. And this treasure may not be there for\never if you tarry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He gets your\ndesperation to put a spoke in the wheel of your common sense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The con man knows that\nhe can get into the dark alley of your basest desires. The main thing that\nreally makes people susceptible to con artists is the idea that we're going to\nget something for nothing. &nbsp;So he really\nbuys into your greed .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He will make you feel\nthat you will miss the bus , for his offer is once-a-lifetime chance and that\nyou may rue at leisure that you did not strike the iron while it is hot \u2013rather\nsign up in his covert scheme. Some con artists even question the basic\nintelligence of their victims for letting go of such a golden opportunity. The\nvictim just crumbles under this relentless mental and emotional pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8fMpAFQC-wM/UQU8TVzFtAI/AAAAAAAAcMc/x9296xG2CTc/s1600/imageskkpp.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-8fMpAFQC-wM/UQU8TVzFtAI/AAAAAAAAcMc/x9296xG2CTc/s1600/imageskkpp.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is a bit of a psychologist\nand a reader of body language. It's an amazing paradox that a con man has\nincredible emotional insight, but without the burden of compassion.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A con man works on the\nprinciple that most humans want to have an unfair edge over other people.&nbsp; He now forces you to judge the book , he has\nworked his ass off in bringing to you, &nbsp;by its cover. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ux6n157lum8/UQU-3a3vz8I/AAAAAAAAcOM/30BsdpQv0ME/s1600/ddddwee3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ux6n157lum8/UQU-3a3vz8I/AAAAAAAAcOM/30BsdpQv0ME/s1600/ddddwee3.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your needs and desires make you vulnerable.\nOnce hustlers know what you need, they can easily manipulate you. If you don\u2019t have\na need they will force your greed and perceived scarcity, &nbsp;to give instant illegitimate birth to a need.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They thrive on the\nsimple fact that people tend to believe only what they want to believe. &nbsp;The con man\u2019s motto is: \u201c work smart instead\nof hard \u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The missionaries who\ncome to convert you are con men of the first order too. &nbsp;He will exploit your need for salvation and to\nlive forever in divine luxury in heaven . He will pretend to be God\u2019s personal\nagent with the right to lock and unlock the gates to heaven.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UgCgOkA2RHo/UQVB3RxQmxI/AAAAAAAAcPs/2trgck4-uUI/s1600/skeptical-3rd-world-kid-4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UgCgOkA2RHo/UQVB3RxQmxI/AAAAAAAAcPs/2trgck4-uUI/s320/skeptical-3rd-world-kid-4.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"319\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such religious conmen thrive on their rapport\nbuilding ability. &nbsp;If you look at the\npeople who get duped, you'll notice that they're extremely vulnerable. It's\nthis vulnerability that leads them to believe in the dreams that are being sold\nto them by the conman.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3tak6x-Bg7c/UQVIMFktt2I/AAAAAAAAcRM/zHUUkKGAckw/s1600/fghjkkl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3tak6x-Bg7c/UQVIMFktt2I/AAAAAAAAcRM/zHUUkKGAckw/s1600/fghjkkl.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In December 2008,\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">Bernard Madoff</span></b>, a pillar of the Jewish community and of Wall Street, admitted\nto having run a 50 billion USD Ponzi (Pyramid) scheme, <b>the biggest scam in\nhistory.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bernard Lawrence\n\"Bernie\" Madoff is an American former businessman, stockbroker,\ninvestment advisor, financier and white collar criminal. He is the former\nnon-executive chairman of the NASDAQ stock market, and the admitted operator of\na Ponzi scheme that is considered to be the largest financial fraud in U.S.\nhistory.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In March 2009, Madoff pleaded guilty to 11 federal felonies and\nadmitted to turning his wealth management business into a massive Ponzi scheme\nthat defrauded thousands of investors of billions of dollars.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zcHFRpwlj9M/UQVWwYWz10I/AAAAAAAAcYI/yoHGeEzrSdY/s1600/downloadvhklu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zcHFRpwlj9M/UQVWwYWz10I/AAAAAAAAcYI/yoHGeEzrSdY/s400/downloadvhklu.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"307\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amount\nmissing from client accounts, including fabricated gains, was almost $65\nbillion. On June 29, 2009, he was sentenced to 150 years in prison, the maximum\nallowed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jeffry Picower, a\nfellow Jew rather than Madoff, appears to have been the largest beneficiary of\nMadoff's Ponzi scheme, and his estate settled the claims against it for $7.2\nbillion. &nbsp;J.P. Morgan Chase &amp; Co. may have also benefitted from the\nscheme\u2014through interest and fees charged\u2014by almost $1 billion.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Madoff did not plea bargain with the\ngovernment. Rather, he pleaded guilty to all charges. It has been speculated\nthat Madoff pleaded guilty because he refused to cooperate with the authorities\nin order to avoid naming his high and mighty political associates and\nconspirators who were involved with him in the Ponzi scheme. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Never imagine that a con-man works alone. &nbsp;He exists everywhere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dp72f3EVI-k/UQVIY36EA2I/AAAAAAAAcRU/Ybm-yRP5IoM/s1600/imagesmkkuyt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-dp72f3EVI-k/UQVIY36EA2I/AAAAAAAAcRU/Ybm-yRP5IoM/s320/imagesmkkuyt.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"294\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Basically a con man is\na psychopath. &nbsp;Psychopaths do NOT possess\nthe ability to show empathy for others and they have no feeling of guilt in\nscamming a harmless blind lady . This has something to do with bad DNA programming.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as a military commander looks for the enemy's less weak and least defended spots, &nbsp;the con man is always on the prowl for blind\nspots and shadow sectors to exploit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7UgGXMIZHcM/UQVdwHm_RUI/AAAAAAAAcbY/BTlRUuaeFbE/s1600/imagesjjuuii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-7UgGXMIZHcM/UQVdwHm_RUI/AAAAAAAAcbY/BTlRUuaeFbE/s400/imagesjjuuii.jpg\" height=\"301\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The con man is good in\nmaking the victim feel bad and guilty for questioning , after all the \u201ctrust\u201d\nthat has been built up. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are mean and self-absorbed\nand believe that anything they do justifies a positive outcome for themselves.\nThey can\u2019t imagine or don\u2019t care about the consequences their actions have for\nthe people they may hurt.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They rationalize away\nany concern that they are harming other people . What\u2019s good for them is, by their\ndefinition, what\u2019s good\u2026 period--end of story.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as a battlefield\ncommander looks for the enemy's less weak and least defended spots, &nbsp;the con man is always on the prowl for blind\nspots and shadow sectors to exploit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The con man has to gain\nthe confidence of the victim. The con man must gain trust. The con man may have\nall the tools to cajole his victim into surrendering personal information ( like\ncredit card info ) ,&nbsp; which makes him\nvulnerable.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">One con game does not\nfit all. &nbsp;That means that there are\ndifferent weaknesses in different people that are exploited by different con\nmen. &nbsp;Some folks are immediately turned\noff when approached by a fast-talker, but are more easily taken in by someone\nwho lays out the story slowly and convincingly. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Remember that a sociopath is patient and can adapt\nto situations like a chameleon. &nbsp;He knows\nwhich buttons to push and when.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iWs8CeMAb9g/UQVSzWY4jjI/AAAAAAAAcUo/UMF1t-knnIQ/s1600/images+bnml;ll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
