font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Con men are expert at\ngenerating emotions \u2013 good or bad \u2013 and can play a victim like a harp. &nbsp;Watch out for anyone who tries to put you on\nan emotional roller coaster as part of a business proposition, in a veil of\nsecrecy , particularly where there are few concrete facts to back up his\nproposal or where he\u2019s rushing you&nbsp; to\nprevent your from pondering about your other options.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jcM5Z0U1MQQ/UQVWnqdbdCI/AAAAAAAAcYA/z1vptyFRcns/s1600/imagesdghkjll.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jcM5Z0U1MQQ/UQVWnqdbdCI/AAAAAAAAcYA/z1vptyFRcns/s1600/imagesdghkjll.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sociopathic con man\nis going to read you like a book and know your pressure points, no matter how\ngood you think your poker face might be in business. &nbsp;He\u2019s gonna to tell you what you need to hear. &nbsp;He\u2019ll paint rosy pictures of your future when\nall he cares about is getting you part with your moolah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-po6b0tVcnJA/UQVSLk9LGxI/AAAAAAAAcUg/lnmSMlg-kjI/s1600/imagesftupl,m.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-po6b0tVcnJA/UQVSLk9LGxI/AAAAAAAAcUg/lnmSMlg-kjI/s1600/imagesftupl,m.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You might be flattered\nwhen the salesman offers \u201cjust for you\u201d &nbsp;a most \u201cexclusive deal\u201d &nbsp;. He will insist that you shouldn\u2019t tell\nanyone about this \u201c top secret, special offer\u201d he\u2019s designed just for you. &nbsp;No legit salesman is going to cook deal so\nsecret he\u2019s afraid anyone would find out about it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fzDDAJhe-iE/UQVWj1LilsI/AAAAAAAAcXI/ukmXbWanB8I/s1600/downloaddfhjuknnvf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fzDDAJhe-iE/UQVWj1LilsI/AAAAAAAAcXI/ukmXbWanB8I/s1600/downloaddfhjuknnvf.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Con men are excellent\nconversationalists and have the gift of gab. They are good in forging a\n\"mutual understanding\" of sorts.&nbsp;\nThey give the victims the confident feelin\u2019 that they are in total\ncontrol, &nbsp;holding&nbsp; all ze four aces.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-opOsLNsNHDs/UQVVHt_8KFI/AAAAAAAAcWU/KxY2NkUZaFk/s1600/downloadddbb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-opOsLNsNHDs/UQVVHt_8KFI/AAAAAAAAcWU/KxY2NkUZaFk/s320/downloadddbb.jpg\" height=\"225\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He will share your anxieties and fill up the\nmissing blanks, to make the victim believe that he has an edge over other\npeople and the playing field is tilted in his favour..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A con artist will\nidentify your needs and expectations, then pretend that he is the only agent\ncapable of producing the satisfaction you need.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently we had Tahirul\nQadri who has Blackwater security, daring all and sundry from inside a bomb\nproof glass container in Pakistan \u201c Shoot me first \u201c.&nbsp; &nbsp;<i>Pahle haraare upar goli maarna , baad mein\nbaaki sab ke upar maarna. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sRWlQjLmnWQ/UQV2dQvvxfI/AAAAAAAAcc8/hTGeEchfohs/s1600/ffe4tg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sRWlQjLmnWQ/UQV2dQvvxfI/AAAAAAAAcc8/hTGeEchfohs/s320/ffe4tg.jpg\" height=\"217\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Outside Pakistan, Qadri\nis often presented as a \u201cmoderate\u201d Sufi scholar who famously wrote a 600\npage fatwa against terrorism in 2010 which won him international applause,\nespecially from Christians and Jews.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zYTwB-SYuCo/UQXF5_0_9_I/AAAAAAAAci4/jyvtCIAi8tQ/s1600/fghhjkl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zYTwB-SYuCo/UQXF5_0_9_I/AAAAAAAAci4/jyvtCIAi8tQ/s320/fghhjkl.jpg\" height=\"219\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One video doing the rounds over the\ninternet shows Qadri giving what appear to be two contradictory statements on\nblasphemy \u2013 the subject of so much controversy in Pakistan. In one clip he is\nshown speaking in English where he says: \u201cWhatever the law of blasphemy is, it\nis not applicable on non-Muslims. It is not applicable on Jews, Christians and\nother non- Muslims minorities. It is just to be dealt with Muslims.\u201d &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet then in Urdu in a different clip he shows strange inconsistency:&nbsp; \u201c<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">My stance was that, and this was\nthe law which got made, that whoever commits blasphemy, whether a Muslim or a\nnon-Muslim, man or woman \u2013 whether be a Muslim, Jew, Christian, Hindu, anyone\n\u2013&nbsp; whoever commits blasphemy their\npunishment is death.</span></b>\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you accost such\npeople and point out their lies and dishonesty, they will retreat and pretend\nit is beyond their dignity to be in a state of defence. &nbsp;&nbsp;They\nwill rather classify you as \u2018neurotic\u2019, \u2018paranoid\u2019, or when lacking wisdom and\nknowledge, they will simply call you \u2018ungodly\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Narcissistic\nPersonality Disorder - NPD , is closely linked to self-centeredness,\nmegalomania, superiority complex, egotism, vanity, selfishness, and obsessive\ncompulsive personality disorder. &nbsp;People\nwith NPD expose a pervasive pattern of grandiosity (either in fantasy or actual\nbehavior), a need for admiration and respect.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our own ex-truck driver Anna Hazare fell victim\nto this, and he recovered the hard way ( like Japan after Hiroshima ) when his\ncall for jail Bharo aandolan came a cropper , with the huge Mumbai grounds\nhaving only a handful of his own paid volunteers--instead of millions as expected..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-byqvyUAT0ac/UQV2qnecQiI/AAAAAAAAcdE/mr4yVdZWLAQ/s1600/downloadGJLP.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-byqvyUAT0ac/UQV2qnecQiI/AAAAAAAAcdE/mr4yVdZWLAQ/s400/downloadGJLP.jpg\" height=\"265\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such people have --<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>A grandiose sense of\nself-importance (e.g., exaggerates achievements and talents, expects to be\nrecognized as superior without commensurate achievements<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Preoccupied with\nfantasies of unlimited success, power, brilliance, beauty, or ideal love;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Believes that he or she\nis \"special\" &nbsp;and can only be understood by, or should\nassociate with, other special people<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Rarely acknowledges\nmistakes, imperfections/shortcomings<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Requires excessive\nadmiration and respect<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Has a sense of\nentitlement, i.e., unreasonable expectations of especially favorable treatment\nor automatic compliance with his expectations<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Is interpersonally\nexploitative, i.e., takes advantage of others to achieve his or her own ends<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Lacks empathy -\nunwilling or unable to recognize or identify with the feelings and needs of\nothers<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Is often envious of\nothers or believes that others are envious of him too<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Shows arrogant, haughty\nbehavior or attitude.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You have con men with\nNPD , working as managers of multi-national corporations &nbsp;. Have you noticed the modus operandi of\nwhite-collar social climbers and the shenanigans that corporations use, in the\nguise of corporate \u201cculture\u201d and \u201cchanging the world\u201d, to encourage naive young\npeople to work three times as hard as they need to, for half the reward. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mVy7-cfIebk/UQV3TP4BruI/AAAAAAAAcdM/aVZNdbjm7z4/s1600/downloadffghm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-mVy7-cfIebk/UQV3TP4BruI/AAAAAAAAcdM/aVZNdbjm7z4/s320/downloadffghm.jpg\" height=\"320\" width=\"255\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE SHOW MUST GO ON</span></b> </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>(\nsic!\u2014puke! ) </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8mNi3YXUqVs/UQV3XV5XvfI/AAAAAAAAcdU/lh6VFFdEBxg/s1600/imagesrtuoop.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8mNi3YXUqVs/UQV3XV5XvfI/AAAAAAAAcdU/lh6VFFdEBxg/s1600/imagesrtuoop.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><b>Never get brainwashed by such slick theories, like above -- you must know when to pull the plug and put an end to the bullshit.</b></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A psychopaths\u2019 minds\ntend to be as clear as anyone else\u2019s. What characterizes the psychopath is a\nlack of conscience and an infinitely deep selfishness. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Also, most of them are exceptionally skilled\nactors. Although their emotional growth tends to be stunted in childhood or\nadolescence, they can mimic as wide a range of emotions as anyone else. &nbsp;In fact, they are superior to typical people\nat having the \u201cright\u201d emotions for various circumstances. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychopaths have no tell-tale signs, and they\ndon\u2019t seem like \u201cmean\u201d people. They are effectively invisible. &nbsp;Among the upper management of most companies,\nthey are surprisingly common, yet never detected until after they\u2019ve wreaked\nterrible irreversible damage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychopaths are also at\nhome in the white-collar social climbing theater of the typical corporation.\nThe outsized rewards and pay packets for corporate officers feed their\nnarcissism, the intrigues enable their cutthroat tendencies, and their\nsuperficial charm enables their effortless rise. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They acquire\n(misplaced) trust quickly, on account of their unusually high skill at\nemotional mimicry. They they dress their intentions in such a way that the\npeople in power will read whatever they want to see. Like \u201cpsychics\u201d, they\nhedge what they say with the purpose of being right by those in power on\naccount of flexible interpretation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They seem to have \u201cvision\u201d and character\nbecause they can exploit the \u201cjust like me\u201d fallacy of their superiors. In\nreality, they are the worst kind of mercenary turncoats. Their \u201cvision\u201d is of\nthemselves on top of something, but that could be a mountain of gold or of\nbones. They don\u2019t care, as long as they win and others lose.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hjuGHa-k-6c/UQV4kjaZarI/AAAAAAAAcdk/SixVST2s624/s1600/fghk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hjuGHa-k-6c/UQV4kjaZarI/AAAAAAAAcdk/SixVST2s624/s1600/fghk.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a psychopath has\nrun his course, the company where he worked is usually damaged immensely and\nthe brand dented . Billion-dollar losses can occur, top executives can be\njailed, and thousands of jobs can be cut. &nbsp;Psychopaths burn whatever is no longer useful\nto them. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After this, people tend to\nback-reason their interactions with that person. \u201cI knew he was up to\nsomething.\u201d \u201cI never liked him.\u201d In most cases, that\u2019s not accurate.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-og5phvU_3MQ/UQV_U0SWMlI/AAAAAAAAcfg/m5DSwJf1BQk/s1600/2960030304003.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-og5phvU_3MQ/UQV_U0SWMlI/AAAAAAAAcfg/m5DSwJf1BQk/s400/2960030304003.png\" height=\"220\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What\nreally happened is this: it was obvious that this person\u2019s actions were risky, harmful, or even criminal, but the person was so effective\nat making it seem that he had the right intentions that people\nignored the obvious warning signs. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They\nmade excuses. &nbsp;They misinterpreted the\nperson\u2019s superficial charm as a sign of good intentions, and the babies got\nburnt.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Con men politicians understand enough about how the mind works to\nexploit its vulnerabilities. Our fascination with hustlers is insatiable and,\ndespite being criminals, they are frequently portrayed in movies and novels monopolised\nby Big Brother in a flattering light\u2014like John Galt..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ow_kVAG2cqo/UQV37BpuohI/AAAAAAAAcdc/TU2v3SFN1TI/s1600/downloadrth.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ow_kVAG2cqo/UQV37BpuohI/AAAAAAAAcdc/TU2v3SFN1TI/s320/downloadrth.jpg\" height=\"240\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A con man is the\nnon-violent version of an intelligent&nbsp;\npsychopath.&nbsp; Unlike his physically\nviolent cousin the conman hurts mentally terribly in the end by misleading\nsweetly before.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From seducers of chaste\nwomen to smooth swindlers to demagogue politicians , conmen come in all shapes\nand forms and may look like anything from a slovenly rough sleeper to an\nimpressively well-dressed and presented international financier to a\nprospective great prime minister like Winston Churchill . <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IVS8WZkXfnU/UQV_B4JsxQI/AAAAAAAAcfQ/bZF6nXKIwzU/s1600/imagesppjhvc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-IVS8WZkXfnU/UQV_B4JsxQI/AAAAAAAAcfQ/bZF6nXKIwzU/s1600/imagesppjhvc.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The suspect is too\nwell-spoken and seems to read our mind and address our most secret yearnings\nand desires-&nbsp; mind you, this is often not\nbecause he is reading our mind but because he has some trade secrets ( together\nwith fortune tellers and stage magicians ) regarding how most people\u2019s minds\ntick and what most regret or yearn after.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Among all telltale signs of demagogy\nand con is talking too much too smoothly often coupled with not looking one\ndirectly in the eye.&nbsp; Because his speech\nis so smooth and hypnotic that most listeners fail to notice the self-contradiction\nbut keep lapping up what he keeps pouring out.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-f1g86KiJqOw/UQV-8hrwzFI/AAAAAAAAcfI/GXFiErrK4q0/s1600/imageskjhgfg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-f1g86KiJqOw/UQV-8hrwzFI/AAAAAAAAcfI/GXFiErrK4q0/s400/imageskjhgfg.jpg\" height=\"310\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>WINSTON CHURCHILL , HENCHMAN OR HERO &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A con man is invariably\nwell dressed and clean. If you notice closely, they will have a parasitic\nlifestyle, yet they brag about their good character.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They have an abundance of\ncharm, an inflated sense of his self-worth, an inability to accept\nresponsibility, difficulty forming deep relationships despite an accentuated\nability to fake commitment, heightened skills for manipulation and lack of\nempathy and guilt.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most career con men have above-average intelligence, and\nthat may help them stay a step ahead of the law, concoct complex money-making\nschemes, or adopt new technologies to use as tools better than other folks. &nbsp;They possess good organizational talents and\nare manipulative and are flawless pathological liars.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Con men who \u201cenjoy\u201d their\nwork often prey on fresh victims even when they have money in the bank and no\nneed to steal more at that moment. To keep the biggest share of the cash pie,\nthey involve as few people as possible in the game.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IBPpQrXbTck/UQWFZk22QNI/AAAAAAAAchM/aWDcMGVkBFg/s1600/imageshjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IBPpQrXbTck/UQWFZk22QNI/AAAAAAAAchM/aWDcMGVkBFg/s1600/imageshjk.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The good news is that most\ncon men get caught because they are so good at convincing people of mistruths\nthat they con themselves into believing they won\u2019t get caught.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over-confidence\nis what traps most of them. They over-reach their skills or underestimate the\nvictim. Conversely, they may become too ambitious, have too many \u201cirons in the\nfire,\u201d and trip themselves up. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-L8WDHpZAADc/UQWFAoslLHI/AAAAAAAAchE/rzbctYcjHKg/s1600/vhjmk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-L8WDHpZAADc/UQWFAoslLHI/AAAAAAAAchE/rzbctYcjHKg/s400/vhjmk.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThere\u2019s a sucker born\nevery minute,\u201d but there\u2019s no shortage of con men in the world to take\nadvantage of them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the NGOs in India are run by con men. &nbsp;Here it affects the nation's security and fabric. Punch into Google search<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;</span></b></span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs RIDING ON ANNA HAZARE'S SHOULDERS- CAPT\nAJIT VADAKAYIL</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i>Below video -- con man Bunty Chor's luck ran out today after more than 500 burglaries .</i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/Zy2Szml39rE/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/Zy2Szml39rE&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/Zy2Szml39rE&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The con man has a\nwarped and complex personality and&nbsp;\ndelving into his mind is like peeling the layers of an onion.&nbsp; Like any serial criminal,&nbsp; he has a signature modus operandi .&nbsp; Once a con man has found his niche, he works\nto perfect his system.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pattern may\nchange a little, but the basic scheme remains the same.&nbsp; For him sometimes it is play\u2014 since he lacks\ncompassion, he does NOT care that it badly hurts vulnerable people. When a swindler\nplays his bizarre game , rules of fair play are mere whispers in the wind.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">Grace and peace!</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://1.gvt0.com/vi/wE4d9NbM1mU/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/wE4d9NbM1mU&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/wE4d9NbM1mU&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Ajit Vadakayil", "url": "https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654", "image": {"url": "//4.bp.blogspot.com/-QSnd-Z8F7Kc/XFtPudWdwlI/AAAAAAABfq4/vxrkFOO7Iu8Mf6-OaPgw6FPpRDSmMgLdgCK4BGAYYCw/s35/capt%25252BajitC%25252Bvadakayil.JPG"}}, "replies": {"totalItems": "80", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1239310337629055957/comments"}}, {"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "7127071073960619622", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2013-01-25T22:02:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-12-07T15:10:56+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNTEyNjM5NjU2MjMyCm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/01/advaita-vedanta-philosophy-adi.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/7127071073960619622", "title": "ADVAITA VEDANTA PHILOSOPHY , ADI SHANKARACHARYA 2000 BC, SANATANA DHARMA  - CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XnylSxHdSeU/UQKzgGTSnwI/AAAAAAAAbjU/QRy0-q2tuUQ/s1600/downloadywwdbnu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-XnylSxHdSeU/UQKzgGTSnwI/AAAAAAAAbjU/QRy0-q2tuUQ/s400/downloadywwdbnu.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">ADVAITA VEDANTA</span> <span style=\"color: red;\">PHILOSOPHY </span><span style=\"color: blue;\">, &nbsp;SANATANA DHARMA WAY OF LIFE, &nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: magenta;\">ADI SHANKARACHARYA 2000 BC</span>- </b></span><b>CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The greatest son of\nKerala ( my home state in India ) is Adi Sankaracharya who was born in 2000 BC\nat Kaladi. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was a 12 strand DNA\nseer with raised Kundalini , the world\u2019s greatest and original philosopher, &nbsp;intellectual , scholar and poet. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He mastered the Vedas written in 5000 BC, &nbsp;at the tender age of five. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The white Christian invader<b><span style=\"color: red;\">\npushed this great man back in history by an astounding 2800 years</span></b>, so that his\nphilosophy could be stolen and attributed to the West as a measure of blatant\nracism\u2014to prove that Indians are worthless </span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">.</span>&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>This is the same pathetic mindset which\nforced them to say that the blue eyed blond white Aryan invaded India and wrote\nour Vedas and Upanishads. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Shankara\u2019s &nbsp;philosophy is now patented in the names of ancient\nGreek philosophers and the modern European philosophers. &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They will &nbsp;never write anywhere that both Plato and Pythagoras were students in India. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They made cock and bull stories, &nbsp;and had it legitimized\nby the opportunistic and servile Tamilian Indian Brahmins. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>That Sankaracharya was a contemporary of the\ngreat Tamil saint Kulashekhara Alwar (sic )who was also a Chera king. &nbsp;That while on\nthe banks of the river Narmada, &nbsp;he saved\nGuru Govinda Bhagawatpad from drowning in a cave, while in Samadhi.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>That Govinda Bhagavatpada is said to have\nasked Adi Shankara who he was. &nbsp;</i></span><i style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Adi\nShankara then replied with a verse composed extempore, that brought out clearly\nthe Advaita philosophy, and hence being pleased like pudding Shankara was then\ninitiated as Govinda Bhagavatapada's disciple (sic). &nbsp;</i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>That a grateful Govinda initiated him into Sanyas and taught him the four\nMahavakyas \u2013 Tat tvamasi, Prajnanam Brahma, Aham Brahmasmi and Ayamatma Brahma.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>They further cooked up\nimaginary debates of Adi Shankara with the ritualist Ma\u1e47\u1e0dana Mi\u015bra, who\nthen became a disciple of Shankaracharya (sic) and assumed the name Suresvaracharya .&nbsp;&nbsp;</i>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BLAH BLAH.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--DXF04xMMOg/UQKzp6g7psI/AAAAAAAAbjc/l71E9mFG8LY/s1600/images+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--DXF04xMMOg/UQKzp6g7psI/AAAAAAAAbjc/l71E9mFG8LY/s1600/images+(1).jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To find out what a fractal brain is ( which Adi Shankaracharya had &nbsp;like Tesla and Ramanujan ) punch into Google search&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE FRACTAL MIND OF SRINIVASA RAMANUJAN VADAKAYIL</span></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is lore that Shiva\nappeared to the parents of Shankaracharya and, and offered them a\nchoice--a&nbsp; \u201cnot so bright\u201d&nbsp; son who would live a long life, or an\nextraordinary son who die young. His parents chose the latter, and thus a seer\nson was born to them.&nbsp; He was named\nShankara (Sanskrit, \"bestower of happiness\"), in honour of Shiva.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-f52UqAbOF28/UQN-FzQiEPI/AAAAAAAAb_8/9bwIAI5_0-A/s1600/imagesbbhyr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-f52UqAbOF28/UQN-FzQiEPI/AAAAAAAAb_8/9bwIAI5_0-A/s320/imagesbbhyr.jpg\" width=\"250\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shankara wrote the\nBrahmasutra Bhasya on Upanishads and Gita. The first integrator of Hindu India,\nhe established four mathas ( mutts ) in four directions of the country \u2013\nJyotirmath in North, Govardhan Math at Puri in east, Shringeri Matha in\nKarnataka in south and Dwarika math in Gujarat in west .. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shankara lived for only 32 years and died at Kedarnath..&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He also composed 240 stotras, prakaran\ngranthas, introductory books such as Upadesh Sahasri, Vivek Chudamani,\nAparokshanubhuti etc., in all eighty books in number. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;He introduced the tradition of Naam Karan in\nHinduism ( ceremony for naming a baby )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">4000 years ago when the\nwhite man was clubbing down animals and eating raw meat, and doing grunt grunt\nfor language in damp caves , Adi Shankaracharua pondered about the source, nature, foundation,\nscope, validity and limits of human knowledge.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was the first\nmetaphysicist. &nbsp;Metaphysics&nbsp; means \u201cwhat comes after physics\u201d.&nbsp; Its object is to determine the real nature of\nthings\u2014to determine the meaning, structure, and principles of whatever is\ninsofar as it is-- with reality as a whole.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a call to recognize the\nexistence and overwhelming importance of a set of higher realities that\nordinary men could not deduce. Metaphysics is the science of ultimate reality ,\nas opposed to appearance or the contrast between appearance and reality .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\ncloud appears to consist of some white, fleecy substance, although in reality\nit is a concentration of drops of water. Scientific theories can be brought to\nthe test of experience, whereas metaphysical theories cannot. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Metaphysician is a sort of super scientist,\nunlimited in his curiosity and gifted with a capacity for putting together\nother people's findings with a skill and imagination that none of them\nindividually commands.&nbsp; He can refute by\ndebate, through a method for systematic evaluation of definitions.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YtQ8z60dv9A/UQNGq5XTWTI/AAAAAAAAb-c/3Xi9E85qkIk/s1600/imagesgnhht.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YtQ8z60dv9A/UQNGq5XTWTI/AAAAAAAAb-c/3Xi9E85qkIk/s320/imagesgnhht.jpg\" width=\"289\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian philosophy is\ndistinctive in its application of analytical rigour to metaphysical problems\nand goes into very precise detail about the nature of reality, the structure\nand function of the human psyche and how the relationship between the two have\nimportant implications for human salvation (moksha). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maharishis centered philosophy on an\nassumption that there is a unitary underlying order in the universe which is\nall pervasive and omniscient. The efforts by various schools were concentrated\non explaining this order and the metaphysical entity at its source (Brahman).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of natural law (Dharma) provided a basis for understanding\nquestions of how life on earth should be lived. &nbsp;The sages urged humans to discern this order\nand to live their lives in accordance with it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you close your eyes\nfor a moment and try to focus your attention on your inner self, it will seem\neasy at first. You will be immediately aware of feelings, hopes, thoughts,\ndesires, fears, and a general sense of yourself.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the inner you, right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wrong!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Advaita ,\nif you are aware of something, it isn't really you.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The real you (the atman) is\nthe part that's aware. It's not anything of which you are aware.&nbsp; According to Advaita , it can't be the real\nyou. The real you is the part that is aware, not anything that you're aware of.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This kind of\nexamination is called viveka (discrimination) in Sanskrit. It is a main\ncomponent of the traditional method of J\u00f1ana Yoga.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pram\u0101na, means correct\nknowledge, arrived at by thorough reasoning, of any object.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Advaita Ved\u0101nta , the\nfollowing pram\u0101\u1e47as are accepted:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pratyak\u1e63a (perception),\nthe knowledge gained by means of the senses. That which is immediately\nperceived to be so; This knowledge can be corrected, e.g. if one perceives a\npiece of rope to be a snake.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8xHKR2UveX0/UQN-TFO8QkI/AAAAAAAAcAE/LbAKRvlFBoc/s1600/679380823_dca7e21647.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8xHKR2UveX0/UQN-TFO8QkI/AAAAAAAAcAE/LbAKRvlFBoc/s1600/679380823_dca7e21647.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anum\u0101na (inference),\nthe knowledge gained by means of inference. That which is perceived as true\nthrough previous knowledge, e.g. to knows that it is a fire because smoke can\nbe seen in the sky (the two are related through a universal law)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015aabda (verbal\ntestimony), the knowledge gained by means of texts such as Vedas (also known as\n\u0100ptav\u0101kya, \u015aabda pram\u0101\u1e47a)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upam\u0101na (comparison),\nthe knowledge gained by means of analogy or comparison. That which is perceived\nas true since it compares to previous, confirmed, knowledge. To know that\nsomething is something, e.g. a cat, because one has seen cats before.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arth\u0101patti\n(postulation), the knowledge gained by superimposing the known knowledge on an\nappearing knowledge that does not concur with the known knowledge. I.e. To see\nsomeone gain weight while knowing they are fasting, imposes the knowledge that\nthe person is secretly eating.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anupaladbhi (negation),\nthe knowledge gained through the absence of the object. That which is true\nthrough a negation. Classic e.g. karatale ghato nasti - the pot is not on the\npalm. The pot could be elsewhere. So the place (on the palm) of its absence is\nalso important.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UxiHNfzBeTE/UQK8_vdzY0I/AAAAAAAAbjo/d5gy3HLI6GY/s1600/imagesppkjhgf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UxiHNfzBeTE/UQK8_vdzY0I/AAAAAAAAbjo/d5gy3HLI6GY/s1600/imagesppkjhgf.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dialectic, &nbsp;in advaita philosophy, &nbsp;is a method of investigating the nature of\ntruth by the criticism of initial concepts and hypotheses.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AA3va8sQEdU/UQPcXK8L7sI/AAAAAAAAcBk/BqZtfkYevgo/s1600/ddde.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"215\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AA3va8sQEdU/UQPcXK8L7sI/AAAAAAAAcBk/BqZtfkYevgo/s320/ddde.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Indian Vedic dialectic is based\non a dialogue between two or more people who may hold differing views, yet wish\nto pursue truth by seeking agreement with one another.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-thfP-qUFAtw/UQPcc0wz_kI/AAAAAAAAcBs/JFiwg4wa0XE/s1600/imagesdcvbnnn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"205\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-thfP-qUFAtw/UQPcc0wz_kI/AAAAAAAAcBs/JFiwg4wa0XE/s320/imagesdcvbnnn.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is in contrast to\ndebate, in which two or more people hold differing views and wish to persuade\nor prove one another wrong (and thus a jury or judge is needed to decide the\nmatter), or loud rhetoric of pea-brained and graceless evangelists , which is a relatively long oration conducted by a single\nperson.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-y_mHEIt91M0/UQK-2CSN4mI/AAAAAAAAbkY/QJPJW9bm-m4/s1600/imageshu8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"343\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-y_mHEIt91M0/UQK-2CSN4mI/AAAAAAAAbkY/QJPJW9bm-m4/s400/imageshu8.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Empiricism, is&nbsp; a doctrine that affirms that all ideas and\nknowledge are a posteriori, that is, derived from and based on experience, and\ndenies that they can ever be a priori, that is, discoverable without having to\nrely on the senses.&nbsp; Laws that express&nbsp; relationships between phenomena, without\nmaking any claims about the underlying causes of the phenomena, are called\nempirical laws.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cfYJwm9Zxy0/UQK-QQzHiNI/AAAAAAAAbkQ/rne4y_pGKK4/s1600/imagesfgtu77.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cfYJwm9Zxy0/UQK-QQzHiNI/AAAAAAAAbkQ/rne4y_pGKK4/s1600/imagesfgtu77.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The meaning of the term\nexperience is generally limited to the impressions and sensations received by\nthe senses. Thus, knowledge is the information apprehended by the five sense\nmodalities\u2014 hearing, seeing, touching, tasting, and smelling. Such knowledge is\nalways about matters of fact, about what one can see, touch, hear, taste, or\nsmell.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For strict empiricists\nthis definition has the implication that the human mind is passive\u2014it is an\norgan that receives impressions and more or less records them as they are.&nbsp; Empiricism then, in the philosophy of\nscience, emphasizes those aspects of scientific knowledge that are closely related\nto evidence, especially as discovered in experiments.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hsMTJwT67zo/UQK-IjCyyUI/AAAAAAAAbkE/C7AmsuaoZeQ/s1600/downloadkko,mnh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"211\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-hsMTJwT67zo/UQK-IjCyyUI/AAAAAAAAbkE/C7AmsuaoZeQ/s400/downloadkko,mnh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is a fundamental part\nof the scientific method that all hypotheses and theories must be tested\nagainst observations of the natural world, rather than resting solely on a\npriori reasoning, intuition, or revelation. Hence, science is considered to be\nmethodologically empirical in nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word \u2018advait,\u2019 in Sanskrit means \u2018non-duality.\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;<i>'Aham\nbrahmAsmi'</i> - I am the totality.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NaRN25b1wTs/UQK-7yij8zI/AAAAAAAAbkg/U10AVRNpZqU/s1600/imagesvgjl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-NaRN25b1wTs/UQK-7yij8zI/AAAAAAAAbkg/U10AVRNpZqU/s320/imagesvgjl.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya&nbsp; set out its basic elements. Part of his\nphilosophy is also concerned with the actual details of spiritual practice and\nguidance through the guru-student relationship. Consequently, spiritual\ninstruction and the interpretation of authentic teachings (such as the\nUpanishads) have been core activities for every Advaitic philosopher and\nteacher since Shankara.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IWwS0e9ds4g/UQK9NNHclWI/AAAAAAAAbjw/muMr3-BC7u4/s1600/hyuuij.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"160\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IWwS0e9ds4g/UQK9NNHclWI/AAAAAAAAbjw/muMr3-BC7u4/s320/hyuuij.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In appreciation of\ncomplexity of the Sanatana Dharama philosophy, T S Eliot wrote that the great\nphilosophers of India \"make most of the great European philosophers look\nlike schoolboys \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
