font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arthur Schopenhauer\nused Indian philosophy to improve upon Kantian thought. &nbsp;In the preface to his book The World As Will\nAnd Idea, &nbsp;Schopenhauer writes that one\nwho \"has also received and assimilated the sacred primitive Indian wisdom,\n&nbsp;then he is the best of all prepared to\nhear what I have to say to him\". &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TWJ3RvF_WzM/UQK-CM1X3HI/AAAAAAAAbj4/dE7H2lHig_E/s1600/downloadgi89;.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TWJ3RvF_WzM/UQK-CM1X3HI/AAAAAAAAbj4/dE7H2lHig_E/s1600/downloadgi89;.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 19th century\nAmerican philosophical movement Transcendentalism was also influenced by Shankara\u2019s\nthought.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaita Vedanta of\nShankara , is one of the main philosophical systems of India . There are two\nmain philosophies while worshiping in Hinduism.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">1. Dvaita Bhava (\nausterities performed are idol worship, visiting holy places, etc)-- by modern mortal so called saints. ISKON Hare Krishna movement is an example.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2. Advaita Bhava\n(austerities performed are meditation, pranayama, etc ) by elevated souls or ancient Vedic seers .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Generally for Shankara the Absolute Reality is BrahmAn , the morphogenetic consciousness field, attributeless and impersonal,--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-- while for Madhava and Ramanuja, ( dualists ) the Absolute\nTruth is Vishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I was amused to see\nsome vulgar fights between the dualists and non-dualists on the internet\u2014cooked\nup by white Christian men with Hindu names.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This has always been the ploy of\ndivide and rule. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This type of petty fights\ndo NOT happen with Hindus who understand Sanatana Dharma . We do NOT have petty\nmeaningless quarrels like shias/ sunnis or protestants / catholics. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are many paths to the truth as per large\nhearted Hinduism, which has NOT reduced itself to a single holy book-- or a single messiah who say that as per our correct way 2+2 = 4 while all other false ways say that 2+2 = 5.</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta has told 7000\nyears ago that brahmAn ( morphogenetic consciousness field )&nbsp; is the fundamental entity from which everything\nelse has come.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Darwin and his monkey\ngang may NOT agree. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness shapes\nour material world.&nbsp; DNA about which\nDarwin had zilch idea , is a transceiver of information, some from the space\ntime dimension and the other form the quantum world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tvasta , the double\nhelix coiled serpents which cannot be destroyed- is mentioned in Rig Veda of\n5000 BC , ( DNA ) as that which gives rise to all life in living creatures.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient 7000 year\nold Vedanta and quantum physics approach the subject from widely divergent\npoints of view and use vastly different language to treat it.&nbsp; Yet they can reconcile without diminishing\nthe importance or subtlety of either. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OGKvV0md9AQ/UQM_2-xW4yI/AAAAAAAAb50/i9swrmEnU6Q/s1600/imagespp-0ttii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"263\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OGKvV0md9AQ/UQM_2-xW4yI/AAAAAAAAb50/i9swrmEnU6Q/s400/imagespp-0ttii.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scientific\nVedanta factoring in the morphogenetic consciousness field or brahmAn is indeed\nthe last frontier . &nbsp;None of the quantum\nscientists have categorized Vedanta as a religious work. &nbsp;They have perused and found that it is a\nsubtle mathematical or scientific analysis.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Om Isha vasyam idam\nsarvam, yat kincha jagatyam jagat'</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"All this-\nwhatever exists in this changing universe, is pervaded by consciousness\"-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">-Isa Upanishad</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta and Quantum Mechanics\ndescribe the same subject\u2014ultimate reality\u2014from opposite points of view and\nperspective. &nbsp;Vedanta examines evidence,\nasserts hypotheses, quotes established authorities both pro and con its thesis,\nand closely reasons its way to a well-substantiated conclusion. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vedanta has told 7000 years ago that matter is\nnot condensed substance but a diffused form of energy\u2014and this is what Einstein\nwho was proficient in Vedanta too seconded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Advaita Vedanta, the\nonly reality is Brahman, the Oneness. All else that exists is surface reality\nof the world around us. Beyond this surface reality lies the true Absolute\nReality, and that is Brahman. Brahman is the only reality of this world and all\nothers have only relative reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science accepted\nconsciousness only after it got shell shocked by the results of the quantum\ndouble slit experiment..&nbsp; Vedanta has\nalways spoken about the importance of the conscious observer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No fundamental\ndeficiencies have been found in quantum mechanics, since the past 7 decades.\nEinstein warned us that science without religion is blind and that religion\nwithout science is lame.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/unB-Paz-5No/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/unB-Paz-5No&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/unB-Paz-5No&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Concerning matter,\nEinstein once remarked, \"we have been all wrong. What we have called\nmatter is energy, whose vibration has been so lowered as to be perceptible to\nthe senses. There is no matter.\"&nbsp; He\nhas just quoted from Vedanta which clearly stated Maya, the illusion often\nmistaken for reality.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AJyKBklydHo/UQNE0yun9rI/AAAAAAAAb80/9jbCWIjfluo/s1600/downloadhhkl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AJyKBklydHo/UQNE0yun9rI/AAAAAAAAb80/9jbCWIjfluo/s640/downloadhhkl.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaita is that state\nof non-duality where there is complete cessation of thoughts such as \"I am\nan individual\", \"the objects that are seen / perceived are different\nfrom me\", so on and so forth.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In this state, there is\nno misery or delusion.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://2.gvt0.com/vi/1mr2G1_UYWY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/1mr2G1_UYWY&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/1mr2G1_UYWY&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Tatra ko\nmoha: ka: shoka:\"--</i>&nbsp;\"Where is delusion or misery for the one\nwho has realized this non-dual state?\"---&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">Ishavasya Upanishad</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Upanishadic\ntimes, men were not spoken of as good or bad. Instead, they were recognized\ninto two types - the learned and the ignorant. As per Advaita philosophy is\nthat, when you are on the correct path, knowledge which correlates and\ncorroborates with your study comes from within you. That is the real proof that\nyou are on the right track.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When creation occurs,\nthe universe the essence of which was always within Brahman evolves itself and\nissues out of the Brahman with name and form, this is what is called creation.\nBrahman creates the world just as a spider creates it's webs out of itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Vedas contain the\nmeaning of consciousness. A visible attribute of consciousness is an energetic\nfield that governs the shaping of organisms. Morphogenesis is a scientific term\nto explain this very shaping of tissues, organs, and entire organisms.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Wb5GcL_SDQ4/UQM5XaPil0I/AAAAAAAAb0I/QH0FVV2l4wc/s1600/;;io%5B--.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"202\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Wb5GcL_SDQ4/UQM5XaPil0I/AAAAAAAAb0I/QH0FVV2l4wc/s320/;;io%5B--.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sankara describes the\nnature of Brahman as such:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThat which permeates\nall, which nothing transcends and which, like the universal space around us, fills\neverything completely from within and without, that Supreme nondual Brahman -\nthat thou art.\u201d</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Indian religious\nand philosophical traditions, all knowledge is traced back to the Gods and to\nthe Mahrishis with 12 strand DNA and king sized pineal glands &nbsp;who \"saw\" the Vedas.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ancient Vedas tell\nus that the basis of all creation is the all pervading</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">morphogenetic consciousness field.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fields of conscousness\nare called M fields \u2013morphogenetic.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just\nlike electromagnetic and gravitational fields.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">All life forms are connected by \"morphic fields\" or strong\nintertwined energetic connections. Our separation from each other is an optical\nillusion of consciousness.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i>Without and within all beings the unmoving\nand also the moving; because of Its subtlety, unknowable; and near and far away\nis That( brahmAn )</i>\".</span> --- <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhagavad Gita,\nCh.13,Verses 15&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness is the\ncreative force of the entire universe. The entire universe is in fact a single\nliving conscious organism with complete awareness of itself. &nbsp;Not only is consciousness responsible for the\nphysical universe and its elements-- it is the universe. &nbsp;The field of consciousness contains\ninformation about everything that has happened since the dawn of time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Om\npurnamadah purnamidam purnaat purnamudachyate,purnasya purnamadaya purnamevaavashishyate\"<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"That&nbsp; (consciousness) is full (perfect) ; this (the\nmanifest universe of matter; of names and forms being maya) is full. This\nfullness has been projected from that fullness. When this fullness merges in\nthat fullness,&nbsp; all that remains is\nfullness.\"--- Isa Upanishad<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fabric of the\nuniverse, the primal Field, was created by consciousness and is held in\nexistence by consciousness. The entire universe is the consciousness of the Creator.\nConsciousness creates energy, it creates matter, and it creates the\nperspectives of space and time.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--g1fMuyVXos/UQM5b8EyIPI/AAAAAAAAb0Q/Ql0HvIBlC5Y/s1600/download;p00okj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/--g1fMuyVXos/UQM5b8EyIPI/AAAAAAAAb0Q/Ql0HvIBlC5Y/s320/download;p00okj.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a\nconsciousness in every molecule of matter. All atoms in the entire universe are\ncapable of mind reading and communicating with other atoms. The expanded\nabilities of self awareness is abstract reasoning, free will, creativity,\nforesight etc.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morphic fields underlie the intelligent organization of\nproteins, cells, crystals, plants, animals, brains, and minds. They help to\nexplain habits, memories, instincts, telepathy, and the sense of direction. The\nstructure of morphic fields depends on what has happened before. They have an\ninherent memory and imply that many of the so-called laws of nature are more\nlike habits..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upanishads, which form\nthe principal source material for Advaita Vedanta.enables us to realize the nature of\nourselves and reality-- to recognize that we are perfect and complete.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strictly speaking, only\nthe teaching as clarified by Shankara should be called \u2018Advaita Vedanta\u2019. &nbsp;Advaita is a system that states that all is the Self.&nbsp; That which is me, that which is you. That\nwhich is the world, that which is in the world, that which is transcendent of\nthe world\u2013all is the Self. .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahman is at best described as that infinite,\nomnipresent, omnipotent, incorporeal, impersonal, transcendent reality that is\nthe divine ground of all Being. Brahman is also beyond the senses. It is the\nbasis of the material world, which in turn is its illusionary transformation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Adi\nShankara, Maya is the complex illusionary power of Brahman which causes the\nBrahman to be seen as the material world of separate forms.&nbsp; It has two main functions \u2014 one is to\n\"hide\" Brahman from ordinary human perception, and the other is to\npresent the material world in its stead.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya is also said to be indescribable,\nthough it may be said that all sense data entering ones awareness via the five\nsenses are Maya, since the fundamental reality underlying sensory perception is\ncompletely hidden. Maya is neither completely real nor completely unreal and\nhence indescribable. Its shelter is Brahman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahman is actually\nindescribable but Brahman itself is untouched by the illusion of Maya, just\nlike a magician is not tricked by his own magic. . When Maya is removed, there\nexists ultimately no difference between the Jiva-Atman and the Brahman. Such a\nstate of bliss when achieved while living is called Jivan mukti\u2014he liberated\nsoul. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First of all, understanding\nAdvaita requires you to let go of all that you know or believe to be\ntrue...Just let go and make your mind blank.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Awareness of our true\nnature melts away each layer of Maya.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">Advaita Vedanta can be the spiritual path for\nboth the scientist and the spiritual person, so that the two need not be\nmutually exclusive.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Uw1etM_duek/UQM50qijXMI/AAAAAAAAb0o/yLsv50gI_0E/s1600/imagesppii.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Uw1etM_duek/UQM50qijXMI/AAAAAAAAb0o/yLsv50gI_0E/s1600/imagesppii.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<b><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The central position of\nthe Advaita Vedanta tradition is that in reality there is no difference between\nconsciousness and the universe, no real distinction between the individual, the\nentire universe and God, Brahman. &nbsp;Advaita ( non-dual), &nbsp;declares that the universe is a manifestation\nof one nondifferentiated reality, expressed in Sanskrit as Brahman, &nbsp;neuter in gender it literally means \u201cgrowth\u201d,\n\"development\"or the \u201cSupreme transcendent and immanent Reality or the\nOne Godhead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karmajam\nbudhiyuktha hi bhalam thyakthwa maneeshina:<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">janmabandhanavinirmuktha:\npadam gachandhyanamayam&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those intelligent\npeople, who think about the truth, who perform their duty or endeavor with\nskill, and with the evenness of mind with regard to success or failure (yogis),\nbecome totally freed from the restraints or shackles from birth onwards, and\nsurely reaches the state of no sorrow.--</span><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;[Bhagavad Gita, Chapter 2, verse 51]</span></i></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most people seek\nexternal happiness from external objects, while the truth is that eternal bliss\nis within oneself and the search must be made within to attain this supreme\nbliss. &nbsp;All the pleasures that are derived\nfrom the external objects are trifles compared to that eternal bliss which is\nthe Supreme. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jc8X-GaLb9E/UQM-HC4Y-QI/AAAAAAAAb4I/kpaiUNWM9AE/s1600/ghki.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-jc8X-GaLb9E/UQM-HC4Y-QI/AAAAAAAAb4I/kpaiUNWM9AE/s1600/ghki.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence, it would the\ngreatest help if one could show the way to this eternal bliss. &nbsp;The Vidya (knowledge) of Advaita philosophy\ndoes this supreme help to all, by showing the way to eternal bliss. The concept\nof Advaita philosophy is to helps to attain liberation, the nature of which is\neternal bliss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am bound to suffer\nthe consequences of actions I do. That means I cannot escape from experiencing\nthe effects of my actions. So either I experience misery if the result of my\naction is unfavorable for me or I experience joy if the result of the action is\nfavorable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freedom from having to\ngo through the experiencing of \u2018sorrow or happiness\u2019 is to be free of\n\u2018bondage.\u2019 That is liberation right in this life or Jivanmukti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jivanmukti is the name\nfor staying unperturbed, whatever may be the circumstances (= results of\nactions done now or in the past), like an unflickering and steady flame from a\nlamp which is in a place where there is no breeze.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cause for birth is\nthe Karma load (stock of the results of actions performed) of the individual\nsoul. As long as action is there, Karma is accumulated and that will lead to\nbirth, which in turn will result in death. The cycle goes on. So the only way\nto completely avoid misery is to get out of this cycle of births and deaths.\nHence if one wishes never to be born again, one must attain a state of\ninactivity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-L5fxvNCJhsA/UQM5-6jNBCI/AAAAAAAAb0w/-PfaTHWfvOo/s1600/imagespiddnnmllh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-L5fxvNCJhsA/UQM5-6jNBCI/AAAAAAAAb0w/-PfaTHWfvOo/s1600/imagespiddnnmllh.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Desire arises in one's\nmind only if he sees the objects of the world as external to him.&nbsp; If there is no second object (non-dual\nstate), then there is no room for any desire at all! Absence of desire leads to\ninaction on the part of the individual soul which ultimately helps him come out\nof the cycle of birth and death.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once a soul is out of this cycle, there is no\nscope for misery and hence this state of supreme bliss is known as \"Liberation\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence, to get freed\nfrom miseries, following the same track, one must get rid of the 'Notion of\ndiversity' which is the root cause of desire. This is the road to eternal\nbliss.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swami Vivekananda emphasized\nsamadhi as a means to attain liberation. &nbsp;The works of Swami Vivekananda, such as his\nwritings on Jnana yoga, have been influential in the spread of Advaita Vedanta\nin the west.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pLFU-a6dMIM/UQLKjgbTB7I/AAAAAAAAbks/6lJOv8hJ-zM/s1600/bnm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pLFU-a6dMIM/UQLKjgbTB7I/AAAAAAAAbks/6lJOv8hJ-zM/s1600/bnm.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><i><br /></i></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To understand Maya, you can watch the English movie trilogy Matrix: Most of\nthe storylines are based on Advaita and the Matrix computer program (in the\nmovie) is exactly what Advaita teaches about Maya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-g7BfbQc75Zg/UQLKpPmRlRI/AAAAAAAAbk0/83O5I_bnDyc/s1600/imagesnk;';o.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-g7BfbQc75Zg/UQLKpPmRlRI/AAAAAAAAbk0/83O5I_bnDyc/s320/imagesnk;';o.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><i><br /></i></span></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><i><br /></i></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaitins believe that\nsuffering is due to Maya. Only knowledge of Brahman can destroy Maya. &nbsp;&nbsp;Maya\ntricks us with regard to our selves&nbsp; When\nMaya is removed, the truth <i>of\n\"Brahma Satyam Jagan Mithya Jivo Brahmaiva Na Aparah\" </i>is realized\nBrahman (the Absolute) is alone real; this world is unreal; the Jiva or the\nindividual soul is non-different from Brahman Such a state of bliss when\nachieved while living is called Jivanmukta-the liberated soul..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All sense data entering\nones awareness via the five senses are Maya. &nbsp;Maya is neither completely real nor completely\nunreal, hence indescribable. &nbsp;Maya is\ntemporary and is transcended with \"true knowledge\", or perception of\nthe more fundamental reality which permeates Maya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya has two main\nfunctions:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To \"hide\"\nBrahman from ordinary human perception,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To present the material\nworld in its (Brahmam) place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Swami Vivekananda\nexplains the concept of Maya as follows:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya of the Vedanta, in\nits last developed form, is neither Idealism nor Realism, nor is it a theory.\nIt is a simple statement of facts\u2014what we are and what we see around us<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The world is both\nunreal and real. but something can't be both true and false at the same time;\nhence Adi Shankara has classified the world as indescribable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KanQmYOCYLY/UQLOOoc1qrI/AAAAAAAAbo4/Zdgli_CIqpc/s1600/imagesdtre.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-KanQmYOCYLY/UQLOOoc1qrI/AAAAAAAAbo4/Zdgli_CIqpc/s400/imagesdtre.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Sankara says that\nthe world is not real (true), it is an illusion. Adi Sankara gives the\nfollowing reasoning: Whatever thing remains eternal is true, and whatever is\nnon-eternal is untrue. Since the world is created and destroyed, it is not real\n(true).&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Truth is the thing\nwhich is unchanging. Since the world is changing, it is not real (false).&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever is independent\nof space and time is real (true), and whatever has space and time in itself is not\nreal (false).&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as one sees dreams\nin sleep, he sees a kind of super-dream when he is waking. The world is\ncompared to this conscious dream.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>na jayathe mriyathe va\nkathachith nayam bhuthua bhavitha va na bhuya:<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>ajo nithya:\nshashwathohayam purano na hanyathe hanyamane shareere&nbsp;</i>&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Supreme Soul or\nParamathma or Iswara was never ever born, nor does It die. And since It is now,\nit does not mean that It will not be. That Soul is unborn, is always, forever,\nand ancient also. As the (human) body is killed, It is not killed. <i>Bhagawat Gita&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span><i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\">[Chapter 2, verse 20]</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5w0jTlHdWVo/UQLN3FYbLjI/AAAAAAAAboo/6NLJKa_wv8Q/s1600/downloadddeewaa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"280\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5w0jTlHdWVo/UQLN3FYbLjI/AAAAAAAAboo/6NLJKa_wv8Q/s400/downloadddeewaa.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bhagavad Gita... the\nmost sacred Scripture of Hinduism existing on Mother Earth ( a 6000 year old pep talk given by Lord Krishna to Prince Arjuna just before a battle ) is without a\nparallel... it's sublime wisdom shall never get outdated with passage of time!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; The cosmos is a unified system. Playing around with HAARP and\ngalactic resonance is a dangerous game.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ox-5CtWwijU/UQLWdQLqN0I/AAAAAAAAbq4/suOCGXoh9-A/s1600/imagesbjkl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"199\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ox-5CtWwijU/UQLWdQLqN0I/AAAAAAAAbq4/suOCGXoh9-A/s320/imagesbjkl.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matter is NOT a inert\nsubstance. It is conscious and active. Experts in organic and inorganic\nchemistry know what I mean. Matter constantly makes choices for alternate\npossibilities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We live in a\nholographic universe. Our mind is holographic. The hologram has the power to\nhold and process enormous amounts of data. In holography, a three dimensional\nimage of an object is filmed with a laser. The amazing part is that any part of\nthe holographic picture may be used to recreate the whole image.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each of the 100 billion cells that make up\nthe body contains the complete version of the original DNA, that was the source\nof the entire body. Each part of the holographic picture contains the whole\nimage. In the holographic theory of the universe, the universe is represented\nby each component, regardless of the size.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To get the perfect\ntheory of everything TOI, consciousness has to be factored in by science. It\nwill NOT be possible to understand gravity without doing this. &nbsp;Every atom within us depends on the rest of\nthe cosmos. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ONScBq8JzXY/UQLX5ZYlxVI/AAAAAAAAbsc/Swt-o0aJEok/s1600/imagesddf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the basis for Vedic\nJyothish or astrology. &nbsp;Consciousness is\nthe dance of chemical molecules within your brain, the scalar field created by\nresonance of your pineal gland with your Mobius DNA and the whirling of your\nchakras . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quantum body&nbsp; resonates with any atom of the cosmos. &nbsp;A scalar wave is far different from a regular\nwave in that a scalar wave goes in all directions into the surroundings. &nbsp;A vector quantity has magnitude and direction\nwhile a scalar quantity has only magnitude. &nbsp;Ordinary electromagnetic waves are transverse\nwaves, while scalar waves are longitudinal .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strangely these scalar waves do\nnot actually exist in our \"material\" world,&nbsp; but exist only in the vacuum of empty space,\nor the time domain At our most elemental we are energy. &nbsp;All living things are a coalescence of energy\nin a field of energy connected to every other thing in the world. &nbsp;This pulsating energy field is the central\nengine of our being and our Consciousness . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Nrq8M3f1cQM/UQNAOmZvQII/AAAAAAAAb58/nvEFHOZWJpg/s1600/imagescffgt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Collective consciousness is a life force\nflowing through the universe. &nbsp;Consciousness\nof the observer brought the observed object into being. Nothing in the universe\nexisted as an actual thing independently of our perception of it Vedas say that\nBrahman is the consciousness, the Self of all beings.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus the ancient Vedic Science corroborates\nwhat modern science has discovered,&nbsp; (\nrather vice \u2013versa )&nbsp; that this\nomnipresent field of pure Creative Intelligence, which is transcendental in its\nnature, beyond the level of the Planck scale of 10-33cm, is the ultimate cause,\nthe unmoved mover of everything in creation.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One indivisible wholeness of consciousness is the source of all multiplicity\nof Creation, and that this one unbounded ocean of consciousness is our own\nconsciousness.</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Purushyo'yam loka\nsannidah\" </i>. \"Man is a miniature universe\" --(Charaka Samhita\nIV).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness ( Brahman\n) is the only element in creation that knows itself. &nbsp;By being in constant interaction with itself,\nconsciousness knows everything about itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Prajn\u0101nam brahma\u201d</i>--\n\"Brahman is knowledge\". &nbsp;Brahman knows everything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-nO6eR9O5YKg/UQLYo1NuicI/AAAAAAAAbso/JTVXZcsrqeM/s1600/untitledrsa.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without factoring in\nconsciousness there can be NO Theory of Every Thing (TOE) and Grand Unification\nTheory (GUT). &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When science meets the\nconsciousness field of Vedanta written 7000 years ago, the last frontier can be\nbreached. The morphogenetic field or BrahmAn of Vedanta, has a self organizing\nelectro magnetic nature. &nbsp;This is a\nmerged grand Akashik field of several morphic fields of different nature by\nresonant coupling. &nbsp;This inductive field\nhas consciousness and self initiating nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This non-linear field\nis holographic and holds information of not only past history by even every\nthought , emotion and feeling held in the right hand subconscious lobe of your\nbrain. This explains the power of prayer and intention. The whole cosmos is\ninterconnected in this field and speed is NOT restricted to speed of light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God has given us 5\nsenses of narrow bandwidth, so that we do NOT have an information overload\nbreakdown.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quantum world\ncannot be observed by our 5 senses, and they do NOT follow the cause and effect\nlaws of classical physics. We live in a time obstructed world using 5 senses --\nand also a timeless realm in the quantum dimension, where what you see is NOT\nwhat you get.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Vedanta is\navailable in the \u201csoap is civilization\u201d Christian West primarily through\nreligious interpreters in pagan saffron robes has prejudiced their evaluation\nof its relevance to scientific concerns.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Ironically today we have our Hindu hating ruler -- the Italian WTE ( waitress turned empress )\ncalling saffron the color of terror. No wonder she cannot go beyond a restaurant table. &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Sorry, I have to lose some grace here.
