font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nowadays all voting in\nthe Lok Sabha is by a show of hands ( by party whip) or by shouting AYE or NAY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where is the democracy\nin this? &nbsp;If any MP uses his conscience\nand cross votes he will be immediately persecuted by CBI raids and Income tax\nraids and then disgraced forever to be a political pariah.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jagan Reddy can tell you more about this. &nbsp;His father YSR was the thief,\nyet the son is in jail ? &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">YSR was given a &nbsp;free run by the Queen bee , as he converted\nthe people of Andhra Pradesh to Christianity using state funds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even the secret\nelectronic ballot system is a farce. The suspect members who may cross vote are\nwatched by the party MPs on either side of him and behind him. &nbsp;For he has to hold down two buttons for a few seconds\nand he cannot shield which button he is pressing. &nbsp;Big brother wins here and democracy goes for a\ntoss .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JKjjV_Ba2fo/UP_BxyIkoZI/AAAAAAAAbQM/ShExKJxF990/s1600/imagesJI0-=%5B.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-JKjjV_Ba2fo/UP_BxyIkoZI/AAAAAAAAbQM/ShExKJxF990/s1600/imagesJI0-=%5B.jpg\" height=\"265\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Couple this with anti\ndefection laws which binds all MPs, MLAs to party whips and not the wished of\nthe electorate who sent them to parliament . &nbsp;Our state governors are un elected minions or the most servile variety.&nbsp; Are we a democracy?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lok sabha can have a\nmaximum of 552 members. At present, there are 545 members out of which 2 are\nnominated by the President from the <i>angrez ka aulads </i>-- nay-- Anglo-Indian\ncommunity. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, Rajya Sabha have 250 members out of which 12\nmembers have been nominated by the President from amongst the persons having\nspecial knowledge in art, science, literature etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The members of the Lok\nSabha are elected on the basis of Universal Adult Franchise whereas the members\nof the Rajya Sabha are elected by the Legislative assembly of each state\nthrough proportional representation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lok Sabha is dissolved\nafter every five years or earlier by the president.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, Rajya\nSabha is a permanent body which is not subject to dissolution. One-third of its\nmembers retire after every second year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Huge sums of money are\nbeing spent to become Rajya Sabha members making this Indian House of Lords\na&nbsp; fish market. Those who give funds to political\nparties make a sort of investment and milk it out multifold later.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rajya Sabha\nseats are more in demand than Lok Sabha seats. &nbsp;Lata Mangeshkar ,MF Hussain etc were never\nseen in their honourable seats.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have power brokers lobbying and pimping for\nRajya Sabha seats \u2013highest bidder gets it. &nbsp;The paid news foreign funded media is also in\nthis game.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Election Commission\nhad to countermanded elections from Jharkhand to this Millionaires Club,\nbecause of big role of money power by money-tycoons contesting elections to the\nRajya Sabha. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former Union Defence\nMinister George Fernandes was made a Rajya Sabha member even without an oath as\nhe is medically unfit. His relatives are enjoying the perks like a ministerial\nbungalow, servants, monetary benefits and other princely privileges. &nbsp;How can we have a MP who has not taken an\noath, bhaiyya ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NTR and MGR had\nabolished Legislative Councils in Andhra Pradesh and Tamil Nadu. They were\nrevived by Congress and DMK. The Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister recently\nremarked that the Rajya Sabha should be abolished. In 1954 and 1973,\nresolutions were moved in the Lok Sabha seeking to abolish the Rajya\nSabha.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both these resolutions were\nunsuccessful.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attempts to abolish the\nRajya Sabha have also been made by introducing private member bills in the Lok\nSabha.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These private member bills\nseeking constitutional amendment were introduced in 1971, 1972, 1975 and\n1981.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">None of these Bills was passed by\nthe Lok Sabha.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Membership of Rajya\nSabha is limited to 250 members, 12 of whom are nominated by the President of\nIndia for their contributions to art, literature, science and social services.\nThe remainder of the body is elected by the state and territorial legislatures.\nTerms of office is six years, with one third of the members retiring every two\nyears.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Constitution-makers\nconferred equal powers to both Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha except in certain financial\nmatters, &nbsp;voting of supplies (Demands for\nGrants), &nbsp;and power to make or unmake\ngovernments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In regard to&nbsp; Money and certain Financial Bills, there are\nrestrictions on the powers of the Rajya Sabha in the matter of initiation,\namendability or delaying of such Bills. They cannot be introduced in the Rajya\nSabha; cannot be amended directly and cannot be delayed by more than fourteen\ndays. However, in respect of Financial Bills without money clauses, there are\nno such limitations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rajya Sabha meets\nin continuous sessions and, unlike the Lok Sabha, the lower house of\nParliament, is not subject to dissolution. The Rajya Sabha has equal footing in\nall areas of legislation with Lok Sabha, except in the area of supply, where\nthe Lok Sabha has overriding powers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the case of conflicting legislation, a\njoint sitting of the two houses is held. However, since the Lok Sabha has twice\nas many members as the Rajya Sabha, it would normally hold the greater power. &nbsp;Only three such joint-sessions have been held; the latest one for the passage\nof the 2002 Prevention of Terrorism Act. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If any Emergency is declared by the\nPresident of India during the dissolution of the Lok Sabha, then that\nproclamation is to be approved by the Rajya Sabha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Council of\nMinisters is not responsible to the Rajya Sabha, but there is no constitutional\nbar to the members of Rajya Sabha being appointed as Ministers. At different\ntimes, the members of Rajya Sabha have been appointed as Cabinet Ministers in\ncharge of important Departments like Home, Foreign Affairs, and Human Resources\nDevelopment etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The former Prime\nMinisters, I. K. Gujral and H. D. Deve Gowda, were both members of the Rajya\nSabha.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EAC326uosmY/UP_Kz9uGdkI/AAAAAAAAbU4/2JW5k60Gvsg/s1600/imagesfgyui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-EAC326uosmY/UP_Kz9uGdkI/AAAAAAAAbU4/2JW5k60Gvsg/s400/imagesfgyui.jpg\" height=\"271\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The composition and\nfunctioning of the Rajya Sabha go against the basic principle of federalism.\nFirst, the constituent units are not equally represented in the Rajya Sabha. In\nthe United States of America each state sends two members to the Senate. But in\nIndia, this equality of states in sending members to the Upper House is absent.\nThe large states send many more members to the Rajya Sabha than small states.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rajya Sabha members\nof a state are guided more by party loyalty by their concern for the state\nwhich they represent in it. They are more interested in defending their party\nthan in fighting for the state concerned in the Upper House\u2014THUS DEFEATING THE\nVERY PURPOSE OF THE RAJYA SABHA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the purpose of the Rajya\nSabha is to hold graceful, non partisan, dispassionate and dignified debates on\nimportant issues and to delay legislation which might be the outcome of the\npassion of the moment. Instead the Rajya Sabha has become the last refuge of a\npolitical scoundrel like Mani Shankar Aiyer, whom &nbsp;people do not want.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;It has even become a shelter for retired or\nsecond-rate politicians as a mark of gratitude for past back scratching done. &nbsp;Many Rajya Sabha members, both in the past and\nat present, are those who were defeated in Lok Sabha elections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unwanted and tainted politician\nfails to get the ticket of his party to contest in the Lok Sabha election. He\nwill then manipulate the party machinery to be elected from the State\nLegislative Assembly to the Rajya Sabha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The latest LAME EXCUSE\nof W for not passing major bills is that UPA does not have\na &nbsp;a majority in RS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A whopping 55\nindividuals were elected unopposed to the Rajya Sabha recently. Of these 55, a\nfairly large number do not truly reside in the state they represent nor do they\nnecessarily enjoy the confidence of the people in the states that they claim to\nspeak on behalf of in Delhi.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1sI-n3EiYgs/UP_E_AHPsgI/AAAAAAAAbTU/VMYVXvsA5us/s1600/imagesfghjkl;.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1sI-n3EiYgs/UP_E_AHPsgI/AAAAAAAAbTU/VMYVXvsA5us/s1600/imagesfghjkl;.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There has been very little debate on how W and\nAKD have come to distribute Rajya Sabha tickets with not\neven the semblance of a contest. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The manner in which the\nRajya Sabha has become an avenue for permanent political rehabilitation of \u201chindu\nbashing \u201c MPs who have lost favour with the public , has contributed in many\nways to the widespread political culture in Delhi of patronage and entitlement.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;\">Many things done by the Lok Sabha are repeated the Rajya Sabha. There is unnecessary duplication of work and the process is expensive as well as time-consuming.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;\">By abolishing the Rajya Sabha, the money that is being given to the members as salary, and spent on enormous perks will be saved and can be utilized for developments of the nation.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5U5dQ7oimvc/UP_KqGD_X6I/AAAAAAAAbUw/oVGogxx9X40/s1600/imagesert79.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-5U5dQ7oimvc/UP_KqGD_X6I/AAAAAAAAbUw/oVGogxx9X40/s1600/imagesert79.jpg\" height=\"212\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A fixed number of Rajya\nSabha seats to each state will &nbsp;&nbsp;bring a much needed balance to Parliament in\nthe true spirit of federalism. &nbsp;In fact,\nmembers of the Rajya Sabha who will be elected by state-wide ballots will be\nrightly empowered to speak on behalf of states' interests in Delhi as a check\nagainst the anti-federal impulses a Hindu hating ruler with\n100% foreign DNA.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A reform of the Rajya\nSabha requiring its members to be directly elected by the people of a state is\nlong overdue. &nbsp;A state-wide ballot to\nelect a Rajya Sabha member bring back a culture of politics where chief\nministers feel directly accountable to the people at a personal level.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the Rajya Sabha was\nmade was to allow intellectuals, thinkers, experts to be in the legislative\nprocess then why do we have pea brained film actors, cricketers etc? &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With 12 distinguished\nmembers nominated by the President and the job of chairman (ex-officio) set\naside for the Vice President, the House has a certain dignity, prestige and\nauthority written into its composition.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>OH YEAH?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>How many of these pompous jokers can beat a 15 year old illiterate chaiwalla boy in Mumbai or Calcutta in a computer derived IQ test?</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">19 ministers in the UPA\ngovernment were Rajya Sabha members. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suresh Kalmadi could\nget into Indian Parliament through Rajya Sabha nomination.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anil Ambani and Vijay Mallya could hobnob\nwith Indian parliamentarians to promote their private enterprises.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">How do these indirectly appointed souls, represent\nthe interests of the people?</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Hey,\nhow about having a single retired army General or an Admiral ( for 1.3 million soldiers and a budget of around 100 billion USD soon ) or a retired RAW chief in the Rajya Sabha .</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Our military budget expenditure is quite a lot and desh drohi rogues are lobbying\nand pimping for sweet deals. The ruling UPA coterie has stashed away billions of black money abroad, as per the opposition .</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over three-fourths of\nthe winners in the just concluded Rajya Sabha polls are millionaires, while\nmore than one-fourth have criminal cases pending against them, according to\nNational Election Watch.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hSpr915OtzU/UP_EglKODnI/AAAAAAAAbTM/s95qbrv3OOs/s1600/imagesdgjkk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-hSpr915OtzU/UP_EglKODnI/AAAAAAAAbTM/s95qbrv3OOs/s320/imagesdgjkk.jpg\" height=\"235\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India we have too\nmany institutions and chambers which are indirectly elected by the people.&nbsp; Indian people directly elect MLAs and\nMPs.&nbsp; These MLAs and MPs in turn elect\nthe MLCs, the Chief Ministers, the Prime Minister, and even the Rajya Sabha\nmembers.&nbsp; The MLAs, MPs, MLCs, the Rajya\nSabha members in turn elect the President.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, in fact, a huge portion of Indian Government is indirectly elected -\nthe MLCs, the Chief Minister, the Prime Minister, entire Rajya Sabha, and the\nPresident.&nbsp; While one can rationalize\nelection of the individual positions like CM, PM and President being elected by\na body of elected leaders, the election of an entire house indirectly does not\nmake sense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Compare this with\nUnited States.&nbsp; The people directly elect\nCongressmen, the Senators, the Governor of each state, and the President.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A bullshit merit\nattributed to Rajya Sabha is to actually delay a hasty legislation passed by stupid\nMPs is Lok Sabha.&nbsp; That does not make\nsense.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How can an appointed body stop or\ndelay ( even for incubation ) a legislation passed by directly elected leaders,\nwithout going against the spirit of democracy?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">More so when Rajya sabha is like \"management quota\" seats\nwhich the management sell to make their money or grab leverage out of fixers.</span>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2zYSqVYCeys/UP_EDM5HvXI/AAAAAAAAbR8/Yp-3pEpjkfs/s1600/imagesgyuuj.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2zYSqVYCeys/UP_EDM5HvXI/AAAAAAAAbR8/Yp-3pEpjkfs/s1600/imagesgyuuj.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many businessmen have\nmade it to Rajya Sabha by paying money to party presidents or MLAs. Recently a\nRajya Sabha election was countermanded because around two crore rupees were\nfound in a car and that money was meant to be payment to MLAs.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-83BaeYRwwdU/UP_BOhSX9SI/AAAAAAAAbQE/DT13BHmOFWQ/s1600/imagesHHJKP0.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-83BaeYRwwdU/UP_BOhSX9SI/AAAAAAAAbQE/DT13BHmOFWQ/s400/imagesHHJKP0.jpg\" height=\"168\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here are some hard\nfacts .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>--A total of 41 MPs in\nRajya Sabha have pending criminal cases against them<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>--Out of these 227 MPs\nanalyzed, 41 (18%) MPs have declared pending criminal cases against <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>them. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>--Out of these 41 MPs\nwith pending criminal cases analyzed by NEW, 13 MPs have serious <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>criminal cases like\nattempt to murder, voluntarily causing hurt by dangerous weapons or means, <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>obscene acts and songs\netc. pending against them. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>--8 out of 29 &nbsp;(28%) MPs analyzed from Uttar Pradesh have\ncriminal cases pending against them <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>--There are 20 IPC\ncharges of heinous nature on MPs which include attempt to murder, <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>voluntarily causing\nhurt by dangerous weapons or means, obscene acts and songs, etc.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>--There are a total 86\ncriminal cases pending against MPs of Rajya Sabha.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>--Out of 227 MPs\nanalyzed by NEW, 131 (58%) of are crorepatis.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>--Out of 227 MPs\nanalyzed, the average asset per MP of Rajya Sabha is Rs 12.14 crore.<o:p></o:p></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QAyLFgdSHns/UP_CkR7HsSI/AAAAAAAAbQc/dKKRRxJWOxc/s1600/imagesGGH890P.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QAyLFgdSHns/UP_CkR7HsSI/AAAAAAAAbQc/dKKRRxJWOxc/s400/imagesGGH890P.jpg\" height=\"299\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>&nbsp;</i></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">CM of UP Mayawati told\nit all when she said at a recent rally recently in a blunt manner \u201c Our PM&nbsp; Manmohan Singh has not contested any public\nelection\u2026he was dragged through the back door in Rajya Sabha and made prime\nminister\u201d .&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dro8PlIVJOw/UP_DRT3rFRI/AAAAAAAAbQk/5jSOLahjG-8/s1600/ghjl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dro8PlIVJOw/UP_DRT3rFRI/AAAAAAAAbQk/5jSOLahjG-8/s1600/ghjl.jpg\" height=\"219\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is true as Manmohan Singh\nlost the 1999 Lok Sabha election from the posh South Delhi constituency very\nbadly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rajya Sabha suited the\nBritish , for it is a legacy of colonial,&nbsp;\nwhen the enslaved stupid masses had to be given the vote but still could\nnot be trusted with a full set of keys to the house.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rajya Sabha membership has\nessentially become a party nomination rather than an election, &nbsp;even an indirect one. &nbsp;Almost without exception, Rajya Sabha members\nare now mostly party apparatchiks or even a few outsiders, &nbsp;but in any case subject only to the approval\nof party leaderships rather than even a rudimentary election.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do we really need pomp\nand show governors and Lt Governors?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is high time that\nthe Rajya Sabha and Vidhan Parishads be abolished.</span> &nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These are a drag on public exchequer.</span>\n&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian tax payers\nhave for long tolerated this rampant abuse of an institution by a planted foreign\nwoman who has shown scant regard for either the original intent of our constitution\n&nbsp;or for national interest.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LiZYn-Vp1fQ/UQHjehUpvFI/AAAAAAAAbgk/PYFwXSHtekI/s1600/04karat.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><i><b>Above -- our lady with a wig -- Rajya Sabha member Brinda Karat who loves Hindu bashing -- yet wears a bindi. &nbsp;Her sister Radhika is married to Hindu hating foreign funded Prannoy Roy of NDTV. &nbsp; Brinda accused Yoga Guru Ram Dev of adding human body parts in his medicines, because the Christain Western tourists started buying these medicines , making the multi-national pharmas jittery . This can never win an election in India, holidays abroad with her husband Prakash Karat -- the Gen Secretary of Communist Party Marxists.</b></i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After abolishing Rajya\nSabha if needed Lok Sabha MPs seats can be increased. There must be one\nrepresentative per 15 lakh people. India\u2019s population being 12500 lakhs the\nstrength of Lok Sabha should be 900. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With such large number strict rules must be\nmade to deter noisy disrupters like monetary fines and suspension. &nbsp;If Parliament House cannot hold that many\nmembers Lok Sabha , the hall must be retro-installed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">House of Lords in\nEngland was a creation of R0thschild, so that he could VETO the voice of the\npeople.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">In India Rajya Sabha is\nthe fountain head of anti-national activity and corruption. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Thousands\nof crores of rupees change hands. &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Government servants subvert justice to secure\na Rajya Sabha seat of a Governor\u2019s seat later after they retire.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Grace and peace!</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
